h4.p: [22] yasmaa na hoti sammoho, akkharesu padesu ca..
[21] tasmaa tadatthikaa suddha.m, naya.m nissaaya vi~n~nuna.m.
[22] sandhinaamaadibhedo ca, padaana.m tu vibhatti ca..

[03] tattha ^b^dhaatuu^eb^ti kena.t.thena dhaatu? sakatthampi dhaaretiiti dhaatu, atthaatisayayogato paratthampi dhaaretiiti dhaatu, viisatiyaa upasaggesu yena kenaci upasaggena atthavisesakaara.nena pa.tibaddhaa atthavisesampi dhaaretiiti dhaatu, ``aya.m imissaa attho, ayamito paccayo paro''tiaadinaa anekappakaarena pa.n.ditehi dhaariyati esaatipi dhaatu, vidahanti viduno etaaya saddanipphatti.m ayalohaadimaya.m ^a^M0.0003^ea^ ayalohaadidhaatuuhi viyaatipi dhaatu. eva.m taava ^b^dhaatu^eb^saddassattho veditabbo.

[03] atha vaa jinamate ``tato gotamidhaatuunii''ti ettha ^b^dhaatu^eb^saddo li"ngavipallaase vattati ``pabbataani vanaani caa''ti ettha ^b^pabbata^eb^saddo viya, na panettha vattabba.m ``a.t.thivaacakattaa napu.msakaniddeso''ti a.t.thivaacakattepi ``dhaatuyo''ti itthili"ngadassanato. bhuuvaadayo saddaa dhaatavo. seyyathida.m? bhuu i ku ke takka taka taki sukaiccaadayo. ga.nato te a.t.thavidhaa bhuuvaadiga.no rudhaadiga.no divaadiga.no svaadiga.no kiyaadiga.no gahaadiga.no tanaadiga.no curaadiga.no caati. idaani tesa.m vikara.nasa~n~nite paccaye dassessaama. anekavidhaa hi paccayaa naanappakaaresu naamanaama kitanaama samaasanaama taddhitanaamaakhyaatesu pavattanato. sa"nkhepato pana duvidhaava naamapaccayo aakhyaatapaccayo caati. tatraapi aakhyaatapaccayaa duvidhaa vikara.napaccayanovikara.napaccayavasena. tattha vikara.napaccayo ^b^a^eb^kaaraadisattarasavidho aggahitaggaha.nena pannarasavidho ca. novikara.napaccayo pana ^b^kha cha saa^eb^dinekavidho. ye ruupanipphattiyaa upakaarakaa atthavisesassa jotakaa vaa ajotakaa vaa lopaniiyaa vaa alopaniiyaa vaa, te saddaa paccayaa.
[21] pa.ticca kaara.na.m ta.m ta.m, entiiti ^b^paccayaa^eb^tha vaa.
[22] naamakappe yato tasmaa, na ta.m vitthaarayaamase..

[03] iccaanekavidhesu paccayesu ``vikara.napaccayaa naama ime''ti sallakkhetabbaa. katha.m? bhuuvaadiga.nato ^b^a^eb^paccayo hoti kattari, rudhaadiga.nato ^b^akaariva.n.nekaarokaara^eb^paccayaa honti kattari, pubbamajjha.t.thaane niggahiitaagamo ca, divaadiga.nato ^b^ya^eb^paccayo hoti kattari, svaadiga.nato ^b^.nu .naa u.naa^eb^paccayaa honti kattari, kiyaadiga.nato ^b^naa^eb^paccayo hoti kattari, gahaadiga.nato ^b^ppa .nhaa^eb^paccayaa honti kattari, tanaadiga.nato ^b^o yira^eb^paccayaa honti kattari, curaadiga.nato ^b^.ne .naya^eb^paccayaa honti kattari.

[03] ye eva.m niddi.t.thehi vikara.napaccayehi tada~n~nehi ca sappaccayaa a.t.thavidhaa dhaatuga.naa suttantesu bahuupakaaraa, tesvaaya.m ^b^bhuuvaadiga.no. bhuu^eb^ sattaaya.m, ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatu vijjamaanataaya.m vattati. sakammikaakammikaasu dhaatuusu aya.m akammikaa dhaatu, na pana ``dhammabhuuto''tiaadiisu pattiatthavaacikaa aparaa ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatu viya sakammikaa. esaa hi ^b^pariabhi^eb^aadiihi upasaggehi yuttaayeva sakammikaa bhavati, na ^b^upa paraa paatu^eb^aadiihi upasagganipaatehi yuttaapi. ato imissaa siddhaani ruupaani dvidhaa ~neyyaani akammakapadaani sakammakapadaani caati.

[03] tatra ^a^M0.0005^ea^ bhavati ubbhavati samubbhavati pabhavati paraabhavati sambhavati vibhavati, bhoti sambhoti vibhoti paatubhavati paatubbhavati paatubhoti, imaani akammakapadaani. ettha ^b^paatu^eb^iti nipaato, so ``aavibhavati tirobhavatii''tiaadiisu ^b^aavi tiro^eb^nipaataa viya ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatuto nipphannaakhyaatasaddassa neva visesakaro, na ca sakammakattasaadhako. ^b^u^eb^iccaadayo upasaggaa, te pana visesakaraa, na sakammakattasaadhakaa. yesamattho kammena sambandhaniiyo na hoti, taani padaani ^b^akammakaani^eb^. akammakapadaana.m yathaaraha.m sakammakaakammakavasena attho kathetabbo. paribhoti paribhavati, abhibhoti abhibhavati, adhibhoti adhibhavati, atibhoti atibhavati, anubhoti anubhavati, samanubhoti samanubhavati, abhisambhoti abhisambhavati, imaani sakammakapadaani. ettha ^b^pari^eb^iccaadayo upasaggaa, te ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatuto nipphannaakhyaatasaddassa visesakaraa ceva sakammakattasaadhakaa ca. yesamattho kammena sambandhaniiyo, taani padaani ^b^sakammakaani^eb^. sakammakapadaana.m sakammakavasena attho kathetabbo, kvaci akammakavasenapi. eva.m suddhakattukriyaapadaani bhavanti. uddesoya.m.

[03] tatra ^b^bhavatii^eb^ti hoti vijjati pa~n~naayati saruupa.m labhati. ^b^ubbhavatii^eb^ti uppajjati saruupa.m labhati. ^b^samubbhavatii^eb^ti samuppajjati saruupa.m labhati. ^b^pabhavatii^eb^ti hoti sambhavati. atha vaa ^b^pabhavatii^eb^ti yato kutoci sandati, na vicchijjati, avicchinna.m hoti, ta.m ta.m .thaana.m visarati. ^b^paraabhavatii^eb^ti paraabhavo hoti byasana.m aapajjati avuddhi.m paapu.naati. ^b^sambhavatii^eb^ti su.t.thu bhavati vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjati. ^b^vibhavatii^eb^ti ucchijjati vinassati vipajjati, visesato vaa bhavati sampajjati. ^b^bhoti sambhoti vibhotii^eb^ti imaani ``bhavati ^a^M0.0006^ea^ sambhavati vibhavatii''ti imehi yathaakkama.m samaananiddesaani. ^b^paatubhavatii^eb^ti pakaasati dissati pa~n~naayati paaka.ta.m hoti. ^b^paatubbhavati paatubhotii^eb^ti imaani ``paatubhavatii''ti iminaa samaananiddesaani. eva.m akammakapadaana.m yathaaraha.m sakammakaakammakavasena atthakathana.m da.t.thabba.m. evamuttaratraapi a~n~nesampi akammakapadaana.m.

[03] ^b^paribhoti^eb^dukaadiisu pana sattasu dukesu yathaakkama.m dve dve padaani samaanatthaani, tasmaa dve dve padaaniyeva gahetvaa niddisissaama. tatra ^b^paribhoti paribhavatii^eb^ti para.m hi.msati pii.leti, atha vaa hii.leti avajaanaati. ^b^abhibhoti abhibhavatii^eb^ti para.m ajjhottharati maddati. ^b^adhibhoti adhibhavatii^eb^ti para.m abhimadditvaa bhavati attano vasa.m vattaapeti. ^b^atibhoti atibhavatii^eb^ti para.m atikkamitvaa bhavati. ^b^anubhoti anubhavatii^eb^ti sukhadukkha.m vedeti paribhu~njati sukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii hoti. ^b^samanubhoti samanubhavatii^eb^ti sukhadukkha.m su.t.thu vedeti su.t.thu paribhu~njati su.t.thu sukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii hoti. ^b^abhisambhoti abhisambhavatii^eb^ti para.m ajjhottharati maddati. eva.m sakammakapadaana.m sakammakavasena atthakathana.m da.t.thabba.m. katthaci pana gacchatiiti pavattatiiti eva.m akammakavasenapi. evamuttaratraapi a~n~nesa.m sakammakapadaana.m.

[03] bhaaveti vibhaavetisambhaaveti paribhaaveti, eva.m hetukattukriyaapadaani bhavanti. ekakammakavasenesamattho gahetabbo ^a^M0.0007^ea^. pacchimassa pana dvikammakavasenapi. paribhaavaapeti abhibhaavaapeti anubhaavaapeti, evampi hetukattukriyaapadaani bhavanti. dvikammakavasenesamattho gahetabbo. icceva.m dvidhaa hetukattukriyaapadaani ~neyyaani, a~n~naanipi gahetabbaani.

[03] tatra ^b^bhaavetii^eb^ti puggalo bhaavetabba.m ya.m ki~nci bhaaveti aasevati bahuliikaroti, atha vaa ^b^bhaavetii^eb^ti va.d.dheti. ^b^vibhaavetii^eb^ti bhaavetabba.m ya.m ki~nci vibhaaveti visesena bhaaveti, vividhena vaa aakaarena bhaaveti bhaavayati va.d.dheti, atha vaa ^b^vibhaavetii^eb^ti abhaaveti antaradhaapeti. ^b^sambhaavetii^eb^ti yassa kassaci gu.na.m sambhaaveti sambhaavayati su.t.thu pakaaseti ukka.mseti. ^b^paribhaavetii^eb^ti paribhaavetabba.m ya.m ki~nci paribhaaveti paribhaavayati samantato va.d.dheti. eva.m ekakammakavasenattho gahetabbo. atha vaa ^b^paribhaavetii^eb^ti vaasetabba.m vatthu.m paribhaaveti paribhaavayati vaaseti gandha.m gaahaapeti. ^b^e^eb^va.m dvikammakavasenaapi attho gahetabbo. ^b^paribhaavaapetii^eb^ti puggalo puggalena sapatta.m paribhaavaapeti hi.msaapeti, atha vaa ^b^paribhaavaapetii^eb^ti hii.laapeti avajaanaapeti. ^b^abhibhaavaapetii^eb^ti puggalo puggalena sapatta.m abhibhaavaapeti ajjhottharaapeti. ^b^anubhaavaapetii^eb^ti puggalo puggalena sampatti.m anubhaavaapeti paribhojeti.
[22] kriya.m saadheti etassa, diipaka.m saasane pada.m..

[03] tatrida.m kara.navacana.m kammatthadiipaka.m, upayogasaamivacanaanipi taddiipakaani yojetabbaani. katha.m? ^b^paribhaavaapetii^eb^ti puggalo puggala.m sapatta.m paribhaavaapetiiti, tathaa ^b^paribhaavaapetii^eb^ti puggalo puggalassa sapatta.m paribhaavaapetiiti. sesaani nayaanusaarena niddisitabbaani. eva.m sabbaanetaani kara.nopayogasaamivacanaani kammatthadiipakaaniyeva honti, tasmaa dvikammakavasenattho gahetabbo.

[03] bhaviyate vibhaviyate paribhaviyate abhibhaviyate anubhaviyate paribhuuyate abhibhuuyate anubhuuyate, eva.m kammuno kriyaapadaani bhavanti. a~n~nathaa ca bhaviyyate vibhaviyyate paribhaviyyate abhibhaviyyate anubhaviyyate paribhuyyate abhibhuyyate anubhuyyateti. ettha kammuno kriyaapadaaniyeva kammakattuno kriyaapadaani katvaa yojetabbaani. visu~nhi kammakattuno kriyaapadaani na labbhanti.

[03] tatra ^b^bhaviyate^eb^ti bhaavetabba.m ya.m ki~nci puggalena bhaaviyate aaseviyate bahuliikariyate, atha vaa ^b^bhaviyate^eb^ti va.d.dhiyate. ^b^vibhaviyate^eb^ti vibhaavetabba.m ya.m ki~nci puggalena vibhaviyate visesena bhaviyate, vividhena ^a^M0.0009^ea^ vaa aakaarena bhaviyate va.d.dhiyate, atha vaa ^b^vibhaviyate^eb^ti abhaviyate antaradhaapiyate. ^b^paribhaviyate^eb^ti sapatto puggalena paribhaviyate hi.msiyate, atha vaa ^b^paribhaviyate^eb^ti hii.liyate avajaaniyate. ^b^abhibhaviyate^eb^ti sapatto puggalena abhibhaviyate ajjhotthariyate abhimaddiyate. ^b^anubhaviyate^eb^ti sampatti puggalena anubhaviyate paribhu~njiyate. ^b^paribhuuyate^eb^tiaadiini tii.ni ``paribhaviyate''tiaadiihi tiihi samaananiddesaani. sesaani pana yathaavuttehi ya.m kammameva padhaanato gahetvaa niddisiyati pada.m, ta.m kammatthadiipaka.m. tasmaa kattari ekavacanena niddi.t.thepi yadi kamma.m bahuvacanavasena vattabba.m, bahuvacananta~n~neva kammuno kriyaapada.m dissati. yadi panekavacanavasena vattabba.m, ekavacananta~n~neva. tathaa kattari bahuvacanena niddi.t.thepi yadi kamma.m ekavacanavasena vattabba.m, ekavacananta~n~neva kammuno kriyaapada.m dissati. yadi pana bahuvacanavasena vattabba.m, bahuvacananta~n~neva. katha.m? bhikkhunaa dhammo bhaviyate, bhikkhunaa dhammaa bhaviyante, bhikkhuuhi dhammo bhaviyate, bhikkhuuhi dhammaa bhaviyanteti. iminaa nayena sabbattha kammuno kriyaapadesu vohaaro kaatabbo. yasmi.m pana kammuno kriyaapade kammatthadiipake kammabhuutassevatthassa kattubhaavaparikappo hoti, ta.m kammakattutthadiipaka.m, ta.m kammuno kriyaapadato visu.m na labbhati. aya.m panettha atthavi~n~naapane payogaracanaa. sayameva paribhaviyate dubbhaasita.m bha.na.m baalo tappaccayaa a~n~nehi paribhuutopi, sayameva abhibhaviyate paapakaarii niraye nirayapaalehi abhibhuutopi tathaaruupassa kammassa saya.m katattaati. ettha hi sayameva piiyate paaniiya.m, sayameva ka.to kariyatetiaadiisu viya ^a^M0.0010^ea^ sukhaabhisa"nkhara.niiyataa labbhateva, tato kammakattutaa ca.

[03] bhuuyate bhaviyate ubbhaviyate, eva.m bhaavassa kriyaapadaani bhavanti. a~n~nathaa ca bhuyyate bhaviyyate ubbhaviyyateti. tatra yathaa ^b^.thiiyate^eb^padassa .thaananti bhaavavasena atthakathanamicchanti, eva.m bhuuyatetiaadiinampi bhavanantiaadinaa bhaavavasena atthakathanamicchitabba.m. yathaa ca .thaana.m .thiti bhavanantiaadiihi bhaavavaacakakitantanaamapadehi saddhi.m sambandhe cha.t.thiyojanamicchanti, na tathaa .thiiyate bhuuyatetiaadiihi bhaavavaacakaakhyaatapadehi saddhi.m sambandhe cha.t.thiyojanaa icchitabbaa sambandhe pavattacha.t.thiyantasaddehi asambandhaniiyattaa aakhyaatikapadaana.m. yasmi.m payoge ya.m kammuno kriyaapadena samaanagatika.m katvaa vinaa kammena niddisiyati kriyaapada.m, kattuvaacakapada.m pana paccattavacanena vaa kara.navacanena vaa niddisiyati, ta.m tattha bhaavatthadiipaka.m. na hi sabbathaa kattaaramanissaaya bhaavo pavattati. eva.m santepi bhaavo naama kevalo bhavanalavanapacanaadiko dhaatuatthoyeva. akkharacintakaa pana ``.thiiyate bhuuyate''tiaadiisu bhaavavisayesu kara.navacanameva payu~njanti ``nanu naama pabbajitena sunivatthena bhavitabba.m supaarutena aakappasampannenaa''tiaadiisu viya, tasmaa tesa.m mate ``tena ubbhaviyate''ti kara.navacanena yojetabba.m. jinamatena pana ``so bhuuyate''tiaadinaa paccattavacaneneva. ^b^saccasa"nkhepa^eb^ppakara.ne hi dhammapaalaacariyena, ^b^niddesapaa.liya.m^eb^ pana dhammasenaapatinaa, ^b^dhajaggasuttante^eb^ bhagavataa ca bhaavapada.m paccattavacanaapekkhavasenu'ccaarita.m.

[03] tasmaa ruupa.m vibhaviyyati, ruupaani vibhaviyyanti, tva.m vibhaviyyasi, tumhe vibhaviyyatha, aha.m vibhaviyyaami, maya.m vibhaviyyaama, ruupa.m vibhaviyyate, ruupaani vibhaviyyante iccevamaadi jinavacanaanuruupato yojetabba.m. atraaya.m padasodhanaa --
[22] siyaa sakammaka.m, neta.m, tathaa hotiiti diipaye..
[22] vinaa ^b^ya^eb^paccaya.m ti.t.the, na tathaa ti.t.thate ida.m..
[21] saruupato pakaaseti, tasmaa te paaka.taa ubho.
[21] yasmaa ca kattubhaavena, bhaavo naama na ti.t.thati.
[21] yajjeva.m kattuvohaaro, bhaavassa tu katha.m siyaa.
[21] iti ce nissayaana.m tu, vasaa nissitasambhavaa.
[21] paa.li.m patvaana tesa.m tu, vacana.m appamaa.naka.m.
[21] paa.tho paavacane di.t.tho, tasmaa eva.m vademase.
[21] vacanehi yuta.m dviihi, icchitabbanti no ruci.

[03] eva.m suddhakattukriyaapadaani hetukattukriyaapadaani kammuno kriyaapadaani, bhaavassa kriyaapadaani caati catudhaa, kammakattukriyaapadehi vaa pa~ncadhaa ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatuto nipphannaani kriyaapadaani naanappakaarena niddi.t.thaani, etaani lokiyaana.m bhaavabhedavasena vohaarabhedo hotiiti dassanattha.m visu.m visu.m vuttaani. atthato pana kammakattubhaavakaarakattayavasena tividhaaneva. hetukattaa hi suddhakattusa"nkhaate kaarake tassa"ngabhaavato sa"ngahamupagacchati, tathaa kammakattaa kammakaarake, bhaavo pana kevalo. so hi gamanapacanalavanaadivasenaanekavidhopi kriyaasabhaavattaa bhedarahito kaarakantaro. eva.m santepi dabbasannissitattaa dabbabhedena bhijjati. tena paavacane bhaavavaacaka.m pada.m bahuvacanantampi dissati. aakhyaatikapade bhaavakaarakavohaaro niruttinaya.m nissaaya gato, atthato pana bhaavassa kaarakataa nupapajjati. so hi na ^a^M0.0014^ea^ ki~nci janeti, na ca kriyaaya nimitta.m. kriyaanimittabhaavoyeva hi kaarakalakkha.na.m. iti mukhyato vaa hetuto vaa bhaavassa kaarakataa na labbhati. eva.m santepi so kara.namattattaa kaaraka.m. tathaa hi kara.na.m kaaro, kriyaa, tadeva kaarakanti bhaavassa kaarakataa da.t.thabbaa. yasmaa pana kriyaanimittabhaavoyeva kaarakalakkha.na.m, tasmaa naamikapade kaarakalakkha.ne bhaavakaarakanti vohaara.m pahaaya kattukammakara.nasampadaanaapaadaanaadhikara.naana.m channa.m vatthuuna.m kattukaarakakammakaarakantiaadi vohaaro kariyati veyyaakara.nehi. eva.m niruttinaya.m nissaaya vutta.m bhaavakaaraka~nca dve ca kammakattukaarakaaniiti kaarakattaya.m bhavati. taddiipaka~ncaakhyaatikapada.m tikaaraka.m.

[03] idha bhaavakammesu attanopaduppatti.m keci akkharacintakaa avassamicchantiiti tesa.m mativibhaavanatthamamhehi bhaavakammaana.m kriyaapadaani attanopadavasenuddi.t.thaani ceva niddi.t.thaani ca. sabbaanipi panetaani tikaarakaani kriyaapadaani kriyaapadamaalamicchataa parassapadattanopadavasena yojetabbaani. paa.liaadiisu hi tikaarakaani kriyaapadaani parassapadattanopadavasena dvidhaa .thitaani. seyyathida.m? bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati. samaadhijjhaanakusalaa, vandanti lokanaayaka.m. mona.m vuccati ~naa.na.m. atthaabhisamayaa dhiiro, pa.n.ditoti pavuccati. katha.m pa.tipannassa puggalassa ruupa.m vibhoti vibhaviyyati. so ^a^M0.0015^ea^ pahiiyissati. pa.n.dukambale nikkhitta.m bhaasate tapate. puujako labhate puuja.m. puttakaamaa thiyo yaaca.m, labhante taadisa.m suta.m. asito taadi vuccate sabrahmaa. aggijaadi pubbeva bhuuyate. so pahiiyethaapi no pahiiyethaati eva.m dvidhaa .thitaani. atrida.m paa.livavatthaana.m --
[03] padaana.m niddeso panati antiaadiina.m tesa.m tesa.m vacanaanamanuruupena yojetabbo. eva.m tikaarakakriyaapadaani saruupato vavatthaanato niddesato ca veditabbaani.
[03] idaani nopasaggaakammikaadivasena bhavatissa dhaatussa vinicchaya.m vadaama --
[21] tatra yassa payogamhi, padassa kattunaa kriyaa.
[22] nipphaaditaa vinaa kamma.m, na hoti ta.m sakammaka.m..
[21] ``pacatii''ti hi vutte tu, yena kenaci jantunaa.
[22] odana.m vaa pana~n~na.m vaa, ki~nci vatthunti ~naayati..
[21] yassa pana payogamhi, kammena rahitaa kriyaa.
[21] ediso ca nayo naama, paa.liya.m tu na dissati.
[22] saga.ne saga.ne tesa.m, vutti.m diipetumeva ca..
[21] ``asmi.m ga.ne aya.m dhaatu, hotii''ti tehi vi~n~nuno.
[21] tathaa hi bhaavakammesu, vihito paccayo tu yo.
[22] naanaavidho nayo eva.m, mayaa ettha pakaasito..
[22] yoga.m tesa.m payoge pa.tutaramatita.m patthayaano kareyya..
[03] tatra aakhyaatikassa kriyaalakkha.nattasuucikaa tyaadayo vibhattiyo, taa a.t.thavidhaa vattamaanaapa~ncamiisattamiiparokkhaahiyyattanajjataniibhavissantii kaalaatipattivasena.
[03] tatthati anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetaa vattamaanaavibhattiyo naama.
[03] tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, ta.m anta.m, su vho, e aamase iccetaa pa~ncamiivibhattiyo naama.
[03] eyya ^a^M0.0019^ea^ eyyu.m, eyyaasi eyyaatha, eyyaami eyyaama, etha era.m, etho eyyaavho, eyya.m eyyaamhe iccetaa sattamiivibhattiyo naama.
[03] a u, e ttha, a.m mha, ttha re, ttho vho, i.m mhe iccetaa parokkhaavibhattiyo naama.
[03] aa uu, o ttha, a.m mhaa, ttha tthu.m, se vha.m, i.m mhase iccetaa hiyyattaniivibhattiyo naama.
[03] ii u.m, o ttha, i.m mhaa, aa uu, se vha.m, a.m mhe iccetaa ajjataniivibhattiyo naama.
[03] ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssaami ssaama, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssa.m ssaamhe iccetaa bhavissantiivibhattiyo naama.
[03] ssaa ssa.msu, sse ssatha, ssa.m ssaamhaa, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssi.m ssaamhase iccetaa kaalaatipattivibhattiyo naama.

[03] sabbaasametaasa.m vibhattiina.m yaani yaani pubbakaani cha padaani, taani taani parassapadaani naama. yaani yaani pana paraani cha padaani, taani taani attanopadaani naama. tattha parassapadaani vattamaanaa cha, pa~ncamiyo cha, sattamiyo cha, parokkhaa cha, hiyyattaniyo cha, ajjataniyo cha, bhavissantiyo cha, kaalaatipattiyo chaati a.t.thacattaaliisavidhaani honti, tathaa itaraani, sabbaani taani pi.n.ditaani channavutividhaani.

[03] parassapadaanamattanopadaana~nca dve dve padaani pa.thamamajjhimuttamapurisaa naama. te vattamaanaadiisu cattaaro cattaaro, a.t.thanna.m vibhattiina.m vasena dvatti.msa, pi.n.ditaani parimaa.naaneva.
[03] dviisu ^a^M0.0020^ea^ dviisu padesu pa.thama.m pa.thama.m ekavacana.m, dutiya.m dutiya.m bahuvacana.m.

[03] tatra vattamaanavibhattiinanti anti, si tha, mi ma iccetaani parassapadaani. te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetaani attanopadaani. parassapadattanopadesupiti anti iti pa.thamapurisaa, sitha iti majjhimapurisaa, mi ma iti uttamapurisaa, te ante iti pa.thamapurisaa, se vhe iti majjhimapurisaa, e mhe iti uttamapurisaa.

[03] pa.thamamajjhimuttamapurisesupi ti-iti ekavacana.m, anti-iti bahuvacananti eva.m ekavacanabahuvacanaani kamato ~neyyaani. eva.m sesaasu vibhattiisu parassapadattanopadapa.thamamajjhimuttamapurisekavacanabahuvacanaani ~neyyaani.

[03] tattha ^b^vibhattii^eb^ti kena.t.thena vibhatti? kaalaadivasena dhaatvattha.m vibhajatiiti vibhatti, syaadiihi naamikavibhattiihi saha sabbasa"ngaahakavasena pana sakatthaparatthaadibhede atthe vibhajatiiti vibhatti, kammaadayo vaa kaarake ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vibhajatiiti vibhatti, vibhajitabbaa ~naa.nenaatipi vibhatti, vibhajanti atthe etaayaatipi vibhatti, atha vaa satipi jinasaasane avibhattikaniddese sabbena sabba.m vibhattiihi vinaa atthassaa'niddisitabbato visesena vividhena vaa aakaarena bhajanti sevanti na.m pa.n.ditaatipi vibhatti. tattha avibhattikaniddesalakkha.na.m vadaama saha payoganidassanaadiihi.
[03] tatra ^a^M0.0021^ea^ thera-iti avibhattiko niddeso, theraana.m ayanti thero. ko so? vaado. theravaado a~n~nesa.m vaadaana.m uttamoti ayamattho veditabbo.
[22] ``bho khaada piva''iccatra, vade yo koci codako..
[22] ``bhikkhu, bho purisi''ccaadi, padampi, na hida.m tathaa..

[03] eva.m avibhattikaniddeso aakhyaatesu na labbhati, naamesuyeva labbhati. tatraapi ``a.t.tha ca puggala dhammadasaa te''ti ettha chandavasena ^b^puggala^eb^ iti rassakara.na.m da.t.thabba.m, na ``kakusandha ko.naagamano ca kassapo''ti ettha ^b^kakusandha^eb^ iti avibhattikaniddeso viya avibhattikaniddeso da.t.thabbo. ``bhikkhu nisinne maatugaamo upanisinno vaa hoti upanipanno vaa''ti ettha pana bhikkhuuti ida.m bhikkhumhiiti vattabbatthattaa bhumme paccattantipi adi.t.thavibhattikaniddesotipi vattu.m yujjati. tattha pana chandavasena katarassattaa taani padaani avibhattikaniddesapakkhampi bhajantiiti vattu.m na yujjati.
[03] tattha ^b^parassapadaanii^eb^ti parassa atthabhuutaani padaani parassapadaani. etthuttamapurisesu attano atthesupi attanopadavohaaro na kariyati.
[03] ^b^attanopadaanii^eb^ti attano atthabhuutaani padaani attanopadaani. ettha pana pa.thamamajjhimapurisesu parassatthesupi parassapadavohaaro na kariyati.
[03] tasmaa idha pa.thamapurisaadiina.m ti.n.na.m purisaana.m vacanattha.m na pariyesaama. ruu.lhiyaa hi poraa.nehi tyaadiina.m purisasa~n~naa vihitaa.

[03] ekavacanabahuvacanesu pana ekassatthassa vacana.m ^b^ekavacana.m^eb^. bahuunamatthaana.m vacana.m ^b^bahuvacana.m^eb^. atha vaa bahuttepi sati samudaayavasena jaativasena vaa cittena sampi.n.detvaa ekiikatassatthassa ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacana.m, bahutte nissitassa nissayavohaarena vuttassa nissayavasena ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacana.m, ekattalakkha.nena bavhatthaana.m ekavacana.m viya vacanampi ekavacana.m. abahuttepi sati attagarukaaraaparicchedamaatikaanusandhinayapucchaasabhaagaputhucitta- samaayogaputhuaaramma.navasena ekatthassa bahuuna.m viya vacana.m bahuvacana.m, tathaa ye ye bahavo tannivaasata.mputtasa"nkhaatassekassatthassa ruu.lhiivasena bahuuna.m viya vacanampi bahuvacana.m, ekassatthassa a~n~nenatthena ekaabhidhaanavasena bahuuna.m ^a^M0.0023^ea^ viya vacanampi bahuvacana.m, ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahuuna.m viya vacanampi bahuvacana.m, ekassatthassa aaramma.nabhedakiccabhedavasena bahuuna.m viya vacanampi bahuvacana.m. evamimehi aakaarehi ekamhi vattabbe, ekamhi viya ca vattabbe ekavacana.m, bahumhi vattabbe, bahumhi viya ca vattabbe bahuvacana.m hotiiti da.t.thabba.m. ^b^puthuvacana.m, anekavacana^eb^nti ca imasseva naama.m.

[03] tasmaa tadatthavi~n~naapanattha.m idha naamikapayogehi sahevaakhyaatapayoge pavakkhaama -- ``raajaa aagacchati, sahaayo me aagacchati, eka.m citta'' miccevamaadayo ekassatthassa ekavacanapayogaa. ``raajaano aagacchanti, sahaayaa me aagacchanti, na me dessaa ubho puttaa, dve tii.ni'' iccevamaadayo bavhatthaana.m bahuvacanapayogaa.

[03] ``saa senaa mahatii aasi, bahujjano pasannosi, sabbo ta.m jano ojinaayatu, itthigumbassa pavaraa, buddhassaaha.m vatthayuga.m adaasi.m, dvaya.m vo bhikkhave desessaami, pema.m mahanta.m ratanattayassa, kare pasaada~nca naro avassa.m, bhikkhusa"ngho, balakaayo, devanikaayo, ariyaga.no''- iccevamaadayo, ``dvika.m tika''miccaadayo ca samudaayavasena bavhatthaana.m ekavacanapayogaa.

[03] katthaci pana iidisesu .thaanesu bahuvacanapayogaapi dissanti. tathaa hi ``puujitaa ~naatisa"nghehi, devakaayaa samaagataa, sabbete devanikaayaa, dve devasa"nghaa, tii.ni ^a^M0.0024^ea^ dukaani, cattaari navakaani'' iccevamaadayo payogaapi dissanti. ime ekavacanavasena vattabbassa samudaayassa bahusamudaayavasena bahuvacanapayogaati gahetabbaa, sa"ngayhamaanaa ca bavhatthabahuvacane sa"ngaha.m gacchanti visu.myeva vaa, tasmaa bahusamudaayaapekkhabahuvacananti etesa.m naama.m veditabba.m.
[03] ``paa.na.m na hane, sasso sampajjati'' iccevamaadayo jaativasena bavhatthaana.m ekavacanapayogaa, tabbhaavasaama~n~nena bavhatthaana.m ekavacanapayogaatipi vattu.m va.t.tati.
[03] ``naaga.m ra.t.thassa puujita.m, saavatthii saddhaa ahosi pasannaa'' iccevamaadayo nissayavasena pavattaana.m nissayavohaarena vuttaanamekavacanapayogaa.

[03] ``tilakkha.na.m, kusalaakusala.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, dhammavinayo, cittaseno ca gandhabbo, natiyaa asati aagatigati na hoti, aagatigatiyaa asati cutuupapaato na hoti'' iccevamaadayo ekattalakkha.ne bavhatthaana.m ekavacanapayogaa.
[03] ``eva.m maya.m ga.nhaama, amhaaka.m pakati, padhaananti kho meghiya vadamaana.m kinti vadeyyaama'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa attavasena bahuvacanapayogaa.
[03] ``te manussaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m `bhu~njatha bhante'ti, aha.m manussesu manussabhuutaa, abbhaagataanaa'sanaka.m adaasi.m'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa garukaaravasena bahuvacanapayogaa.
[03] ``appaccayaa ^a^M0.0025^ea^ dhammaa, asa"nkhataa dhammaa'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa aparicchedavasena bahuvacanapayogaa, aniyamitasa"nkhaavasena bahuvacanapayogaa vaa.

[03] keci pana ``desanaasotapaatavasena bahuvacanapayogaa''tipi vadanti, ta.m na gahetabba.m. na hi tathaagato satisampaja~n~narahito dhamma.m deseti, yutti ca na dissati ``maatikaaya.m pucchaaya.m vissajjane caati tiisupi .thaanesu appaccayaadidhamme desento satthaa punappuna.m bahuvacanavasena desanaasote patitvaa dhamma.m desetii''ti.
[03] ``katame dhammaa appaccayaa'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa maatikaanusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogaa.
[03] ``ime dhammaa appaccayaa'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa pucchaanusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogaa.
[03] ``katame dhammaa no paraamaasaa, te dhamme .thapetvaa avasesaa kusalaakusalaabyaakataa dhammaa'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa pucchaasabhaagena bahuvacanapayogaa.

[03] ``atthi bhikkhave a~n~neva dhammaa gambhiiraa duddasaa duranubodhaa santaa pa.niitaa atakkaavacaraa nipu.naa pa.n.ditavedaniiyaa, ye tathaagato saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedetii''ti ayamekassatthassa puthucittasamaayogaputhuaaramma.navasena bahuvacanapayogo.
[03] ``eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m mahaavane,
[03] iccevamaadayo saddaa ye ye bahavo, tannivaasata.mputtasa"nkhaatassekatthassa ruu.lhiivasena bahuvacanapayogaa.

[03] ``saariputtamoggallaane aamantesi `gacchatha tumhe saariputtaa kii.taagiri.m gantvaa assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m karotha, tumhaaka.m ete saddhivihaarino'ti'', ``kacci vo kulaputtaa, etha byagghaa nivattavho'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa a~n~nenatthena ekaabhidhaanavasena bahuvacanapayogaa.
[03] ``ma~ncaa ukku.t.thi.m karonti'' iccevamaadayo ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahuvacanapayogaa.
[03] ``cattaaro sammappadhaanaa''ti aya.m pana kiccabhedena ekassatthassa bahuvacanapayogo.

[03] tattha ekatthekavacana.m, samudaayaapekkhekavacana.m, jaatyaapekkhekavacana.m, tannissayaapekkhekavacana.m, ekattalakkha.nekavacananti pa~ncavidha.m ekavacana.m bhavati. ettha pana jaatyaapekkhekavacana.m atthato saama~n~naapekkhekavacanamevaati da.t.thabba.m.

[03] bavhatthabahuvacana.m, bahusamudaayaapekkhabahuvacana.m, attabahuvacana.m, garukaarabahuvacana.m, aparicchedabahuvacana.m, maatikaanusandhinayabahuvacana.m, pucchaanusandhinayabahuvacana.m, pucchaasabhaagabahuvacana.m, puthucittasamaayogaputhuaaramma.nabahuvacana.m, tannivaasabahuvacana.m, ta.mputtabahuvacana.m, ekaabhidhaanabahuvacana.m, tannissitaapekkhabahuvacana.m ^a^M0.0027^ea^, aaramma.nabhedabahuvacana.m, kiccabhedabahuvacananti pannarasavidha.m bahuvacana.m bhavati. icceva.m viisadhaa sabbaani ekavacanabahuvacanaani sa"ngahitaani. atrida.m paa.livavatthaana.m --

[03] idaani kaalaadivasena aakhyaatappavatti.m diipayissaama -- kaalakaarakapurisaparidiipaka.m kriyaalakkha.na.m ^b^aakhyaatika.m^eb^. tatra ^b^kaala^eb^nti atiitaanaagatapaccuppannavasena tayo kaalaa, atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa.nattiparikappakaalaatipattivasena pana cha, te ekekaa tipurisakaa.
[03] ^b^kaaraka^eb^nti kammakattubhaavaa. te hi upacaaramukhyasabhaavavasena karonti kara.nanti ca ``kaarakaa''ti vuccanti. teva yathaakkama.m kriyaanimitta ta.msaadhaka ta.msabhaavaati veditabbaa.
[21] kamma.m kattaa ca bhaavo ca, icceva.m kaarakaa tidhaa.
[21] kaarakatta.m tu bhaavassa, sacepi na samiirita.m.
[21] kriyaanipphatti ^a^M0.0029^ea^ natthiiti, yuttitopi ca natthi ta.m.

[03] ^b^puriso^eb^ti ekavacanabahuvacanakaa pa.thamamajjhimuttamapurisaa. tattha pa.thamapuriso aakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.ne saadhakavaacake vaa kammavaacake vaa ^b^tumhaa'mha^eb^saddavajjite paccattavacanabhuute naamamhi ``abhiniihaaro samijjhati, bodhi vuccati catuusu maggesu~naa.na''ntiaadiisu viya payujjamaanepi, ta.t.thaaniyatte sati ``bhaasati vaa karoti vaa, pii.liyakkhoti ma.m viduu, vuccatiiti vacana''ntiaadiisu viya appayujjamaanepi sabbadhaatuuhi paro hoti. katthaci pana paa.lippadese naamassa appayuttattaa pa.thamapurisapayogattho duranubodho bhavati, yathaa ``dukkha.m te vedayissaami, tattha assaasayantu ma''nti. tathaa hi ettha ``paadaa''ti paa.thaseso, tasmi.m dukkhasaasanaarocane vattu.m avisahanavasena kilamanta.m ma.m devassa ubho paadaa assaasentu, vissa.t.tho kathehiiti ma.m vadathaati adhippaayo ca bhavati.
[22] tasmaa upa.t.thaha.m ga.nhe, garu.m garumata.m viduu..

[03] tatrimaani ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaataadhikaarattaa ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatuvasena nidassanapadaani. so paribhavati, te paribhavanti, paribhavati, paribhavanti. sapatto abhibhaviyate, sabbaa vityaa'nubhuuyate, abhibhaviyate, anubhuuyateti. yattha satipi naamassa saadhakavaacakatte apaccattavacanattaa aakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.nataa na labbhati, tattha kammavaacaka.m paccattavacanabhuuta.m tulyaadhikara.napada.m pa.ticca pa.thamapurisaadayo tayo labbhanti. ta.m ^a^M0.0030^ea^ yathaa? paribhaviyyate puriso devadattena, paribhaviyyase tva.m devadattena, paribhaviyyamhe maya.m akusalehi dhammehi. ettha panida.m vacana.m na vattabba.m ``nindanti tu.nhimaasina'ntiaadiisu satipi naamassa kammavaacakatte apaccattavacanattaa aakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.nataa na labbhatiiti pa.thamapurisuppatti na siyaa''ti. kasmaati ce? ``nindanti tu.nhimaasina''ntiaadiisu ``janaa''ti ajjhaaharitabbassa saadhakavaacakassa naamassa saddhimaakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.nabhaavassa icchitattaa. evamuttaratraapi nayo.

[03] majjhimapuriso aakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.ne saadhakavaacake vaa kammavaacake vaa paccattavacanabhuute ^b^tumha^eb^sadde payujjamaanepi, ta.t.thaaniyatte sati appayujjamaanepi sabbadhaatuuhi paro hoti. tva.m atibhavasi, tumhe atibhavatha, atibhavasi, atibhavatha. tva.m paribhaviyase devadattena, tumhe paribhaviyavhe. yattha satipi ^b^tumha^eb^saddassa saadhakavaacakatte apaccattavacanattaa aakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.nataa na labbhati, na tattha majjhimapuriso hoti. itare pana dve honti kammavaacaka.m paccattavacanabhuuta.m tulyaadhikara.napada.m pa.ticca. ta.m yathaa? tayaa abhibhaviyate sapatto, tayaa abhibhaviye aha.m.

[03] uttamapuriso aakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.ne saadhakavaacake vaa kammavaacake vaa paccattavacanabhuute ^b^amha^eb^sadde payujjamaanepi, ta.t.thaaniyatte sati appayujjamaanepi sabbadhaatuuhi paro hoti. aha.m paribhavaami, maya.m paribhavaama, paribhavaami, paribhavaama. aha.m paribhaviyyaami akusalehi dhammehi, maya.m paribhaviyyaama, paribhaviyyaami, paribhaviyyaama. yattha satipi ^b^amha^eb^saddassa saadhakavaacakatte apaccattavacanattaa aakhyaatapadena tulyaadhikara.nataa na labbhati, na tattha ^a^M0.0031^ea^ uttamapuriso hoti. itare pana dve honti kammavaacaka.m paccattavacanabhuuta.m tulyaadhikara.napada.m pa.ticca. ta.m yathaa? mayaa anubhaviyate sampatti, mayaa abhibhaviyase tva.m. eva.m yattha yattha saadhakavaacakaana.m vaa kammavaacakaana.m vaa naamaadiina.m paccattavacanabhuutaana.m aakhyaatapadehi tulyaadhikara.natte laddhe tattha tattha pa.thamapurisaadayo labbhanti, tasmaa naamaadiina.m paccattavacanabhuutaana.m tulyaadhikara.nabhaavoyeva pa.thamapurisaadiinamuppattiyaa kaara.na.m.

[03] dvinna.m ti.n.na.m vaa purisaanamekaabhidhaane paro puriso gahetabbo. ettha ekaabhidhaana.m naama ekato abhidhaana.m ekakaalaabhidhaana~nca. ta~nca kho ^b^ca^eb^saddapayogeyeva, acasaddapayoge bhinnakaalaabhidhaane taggaha.naabhaavato. ``tumhe atthakusalaa bhavatha, mayamatthakusalaa bhavaama'' iccevamaadayo tappayogaa. tattha tumhe atthakusalaa bhavatha -- iccetasmi.m vohaare ``so ca atthakusalo bhavati, tva~nca atthakusalo bhavasi, tumhe atthakusalaa bhavathaa''ti eva.m dvinnamekaabhidhaane paro puriso gahetabbo. ``mayamatthakusalaa bhavaama'' iccetasmi.m pana ``so ca atthakusalo bhavati, aha~nca atthakusalo bhavaami, mayamatthakusalaa bhavaamaa''ti vaa ``tva~nca atthakusalo bhavasi, aha~nca atthakusalo bhavaami, mayamatthakusalaa bhavaamaa''ti vaa evampi dvinnamekaabhidhaane paro puriso gahetabbo. ``so ca atthakusalo bhavati, tva~nca atthakusalo bhavasi, aha~nca atthakusalo bhavaami, mayamatthakusalaa bhavaamaa''ti vaa ``so ca atthakusalo bhavati, te ca atthakusalaa bhavanti, tva~nca atthakusalo bhavasi, tumhe ca atthakusalaa bhavatha, aha~nca atthakusalo bhavaami, mayamatthakusalaa bhavaamaa''ti vaa eva.m ti.n.namekaabhidhaane paro puriso gahetabbo.

[03] aparopi ^a^M0.0032^ea^ atthanayo vuccati -- ``tva~nca atthakusalo bhavasi, so ca atthakusalo bhavati, tumhe atthakusalaa bhavathaa''ti vaa ``aha~nca atthakusalo bhavaami, so ca atthakusalo bhavati, mayamatthakusalaa bhavaamaa''ti vaa iminaa nayena anekappabhedo atthanayo. eva.m sesaasu vibhattiisu pa~ncamiisattamiyaadiisu paropuriso gahetabbo. sabbesu ca kriyaapadesu bavhatthavaacakesu bahuvacanantesu, na pana bahuvacanantesupi ekassattano vaacakesu garukaatabbassekassatthassa vaacakesu ca kriyaapadesu. ettha codanaasandiipaniyo imaa gaathaa --
[21] pacchaa vutto paro naama, sa~n~naaya pa.tipaa.tiyaa.
[21] pa.thamamhaa paro naama, majjhimo uttamopi ca.
[22] majjhimamhaa paro naama, uttamo puriso ruto..
[21] ``tva~nca bhadde sukhii hohi, eso caapi mahaamigo''.
[22] iti paa.tho yato di.t.tho, tasmaa eva.m vademase..
[21] ``tumhe dve sukhitaa hotha'', iccattho tattha dissati.
[22] tva~nca jaanapadaa ceva, negamaa ca samaagataa''..
[21] etaa gaathaapi etassa, atthassa pana saadhikaa.
[22] eva.m vi~n~nuuhi vi~n~neyya.m, bahunaa bhaasitena ki.m..
[22] na virujjhati ce attho, ta.m pamaa.na.m sudhiimata.m..
[03] sa"nkhepatopettha purisappavatti eva.m upalakkhitabbaa ^b^``amha^eb^vacanatthe uttamo, ^b^tumha^eb^vacanatthe majjhimo, a~n~nesa.m vacanatthe pa.thamo''ti.
[21] tyaadiina.m purisasa~n~naa, yasmaa vuttaa tato ida.m.
[21] lakkhiyati ^a^M0.0034^ea^ kriyaayeta.m, kriyaa vaa assa lakkha.na.m.
[22] kriyaalakkha.nataa eva.m, veditabbaa tathaa hi ca..

[03] eva.m kaalesu vibhattippavatti.m ~natvaa ye te suttantesu vicittaa suvisadavipulatikhi.nabuddhivisayabhuutaa payogaa dissanti, tesu paa.tavamicchantehi tyaadikkamena vuccamaanaa kriyaapadamaalaa ^a^M0.0035^ea^ sallakkhitabbaa -- bhavati, bhavanti. bhavasi, bhavatha. bhavaami, bhavaama. bhavate, bhavante. bhavase, bhavavhe. bhave, bhavaamhe. aya.m a~n~nayogaadirahitaa kriyaapadamaalaa.

[03] dissanti ca suttantesu atthasambhavepi a~n~nayogaadirahitaani kriyaapadaani. seyyathida.m? ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaati, yadaa pa~n~naaya passati. ya.m ma.m bha.nasi saarathi. a~n~na.m sepa.n.ni gacchaami'' iccevamaadiini etassatthassa paridiipaniyaa kriyaapadamaalaa.

[03] ettha tividho kriyaapadesu yogo ^b^ta^eb^yogo, ^b^ma^eb^yogo, a~n~nayogo ca. tattha majjhimapurisaa ^b^ta^eb^yogavasena gahetabbaa, uttamapurisaa ^b^ma^eb^yogavasena. pa.thamapurisaa a~n~nayogavasena. tyaadiinamettha pa.tipaa.tiyaa aya.m anugiiti --

[03] sotuuna.m payogesu kosallattha.m a~n~nayogaadisahitamaparampi kriyaapadamaala.m vadaama -- so bhavati, te bhavanti. tva.m bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha. aha.m bhavaami, maya.m bhavaama. so bhavate, te bhavante. tva.m bhavase, tumhe bhavavhe. aha.m bhave, maya.m bhavaamhe. aya.m a~n~nayogaadisahitaa kriyaapadamaalaa.

[03] dissanti ca suttantesu a~n~nayogaadisahitaanipi kriyaapadaani. seyyathida.m? ^b^``ya.m^eb^paaya.m deva kumaaro suppati.t.thitapaado, idampimassa mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati, tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti. yo dandhakaale tarati ^a^M0.0036^ea^, tara.niiye ca dandhati, tva.msi aacariyo mama, ahampi da.t.thukaamosmi, pitara.m me idhaagata.m'' iccevamaadiini etassatthassa paridiipaniyaa kriyaapadamaalaa.

[03] yo ^b^tumha^eb^saddena vattabbe atthe nipatati, na pana hoti tumhatthavaacako, neso saddo kriyaapadassa ^b^ta^eb^yogasahitatta.m saadheti, a~n~nadatthu a~n~nayogasahitatta~n~neva saadheti. yo ca ^b^amha^eb^saddena vattabbe atthe nipatati, na pana hoti amhatthavaacako, na sopi saddo kriyaapadassa ^b^ma^eb^yogasahitatta.m saadheti, a~n~nadatthu a~n~nayogasahitatta~n~neva saadheti.

[03] tatra ^b^tumha^eb^saddena taava vattabbatthe -- ``na bhava.m eti pu~n~nattha.m, siviraajassa dassana.m. maayasmaa samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkami. idha bhante bhagavaa pa.msukuula.m dhovatuu''ti iccevamaadayo payogaa. ^b^amha^eb^saddena pana vattabbatthe ``upaali ta.m mahaaviira, paade vandati satthuno. saavako te mahaaviira, sara.no vandati satthuno''ti ca iccevamaadayo payogaa. idametthupalakkhitabba.m ``tva.m tumhe aha.m maya''nti atthadiipaka ^b^ta^eb^yoga ^b^ma^eb^yogato a~n~no a~n~natthadiipano payogoyeva a~n~nayogo naama, tattha pa.thamapuriso bhavatiiti.

[03] yajjeva.m ``sabbaayasa.m kuu.tamatippamaa.na.m, paggayha so ti.t.thasi antalikkhe. esa sutvaa pasiidaami, vaco te isisattamaa''tiaadiisu katha.m. ettha hi majjhimuttamapurisasambhavoyeva dissati, na tu pa.thamapurisasambhavoti? vuccate -- ``sabbaayasa.m kuu.tamatippamaa.na.m, paggayha so ti.t.thasi antalikkhe''tiaadiisu ``so''tiaadikassa naamasaddassa ^b^tumha'mha^eb^saddassatthavaacakasaddehi``ti.t.thasii''tiaadiina.m syaadyantaana.m padaana.m dassanato accantamajjhaaharitabbehi ^a^M0.0037^ea^ samaanaadhikara.nattaa taggu.nabhuutattaa ca majjhimuttamapurisasambhavo samadhigantabbo. iidisesu payogesu syaadyantaana.m dassanavasena avijjamaanaanipi ajjhaaharitabbaani ``tvamaha''miccaadiini padaani bhavanti. katthaci pana paripu.n.naani dissanti ``saatva.m va"nkamanuppattaa, katha.m maddi karissasi. so aha.m vicarissaami, gaamaa gaama.m puraa pura''nti iccevamaadiisu.
[03] aakhyaatikassa kriyaalakkha.nattaa ali"ngabhedattaa ca ti.n.na.m li"ngaana.m saadhaara.nabhaavaparidiipanattha.m aparampi kriyaapadamaala.m vadaama --

[03] puriso bhavati, ka~n~naa bhavati, citta.m bhavati, purisaa bhavanti, ka~n~naayo bhavanti, cittaani bhavanti. bho purisa tva.m bhavasi, bhoti ka~n~ne tva.m bhavasi, bho citta tva.m bhavasi, bhavanto purisaa tumhe bhavatha, bhotiyo ka~n~naayo tumhe bhavatha, bhavanto cittaani tumhe bhavatha. aha.m puriso bhavaami, aha.m ka~n~naa bhavaami, aha.m citta.m bhavaami, maya.m purisaa bhavaama, maya.m ka~n~naayo bhavaama, maya.m cittaani bhavaama.
[03] esa nayo attanopadesu, sesavibhattiina.m sabbapadesupi. ayamaakhyaatikassa ti.n.na.m li"ngaana.m saadhaara.nabhaavaparidiipanii kriyaapadamaalaava.

[03] vutta~nheta.m ^b^niruttipi.take^eb^ ``kriyaalakkha.namaakhyaatikamali"ngabheda''miti. tatra ^b^ali"ngabheda^eb^miti ko attho? itthipumanapu.msakaana.m avisesattho vuccate ``ali"ngabheda''miti. yathaa ``puriso gacchati, ka~n~naa gacchati, citta.m gacchatii''ti. catudhaa uddi.t.thakriyaapadesu yathaa ``bhavatii''ti ^b^a^eb^kaaraanantaratyantapada.m gahetvaa ``bhavati bhavanti bhavasii''tiaadinaa kriyaapadamaalaa sabbathaa kataa, eva.m ``ubbhavati''ccaadiinipi ^b^a^eb^kaaraanantaratyantapadaani gahetvaa ``ubbhavati ubbhavanti ubbhavasii''tiaadinaa ^a^M0.0038^ea^ kriyaapadamaalaa sabbathaa kaatabbaa. ``bhoti sambhotii''tiaadiini pana okaaraanantaratyantapadaani, ``bhaaveti vibhaavetii''tiaadiini ca ekaaraanantaratyantapadaani gahetvaa paa.linayaanusaareneva padamaalaa kaatabbaa, nayidha vuttanayaanusaarena. iidisesu hi .thaanesu duranubodhaa kriyaapadagati. ato labbhamaanavasena kriyaapadamaalaa kaatabbaa. na hi loke lokiyaa sabbe dhaatusadde pacceka.m sabbehipi channavutiyaa vacanehi yojetvaa vadanti, eva.m avadantaanampi nesa.m kathaa aparipu.n.naa naama na hoti, tasmaa vajjetabba.t.thaana.m vajjetvaa yathaasambhava.m padamaalaa kaatabbaa. eva.m pa~ncamiyaadiisupi vibhattiisu. aya.m vattamaanavibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.

[03] ito pa.t.thaaya pana yathuddi.t.thapadaaneva pari.naametvaa pari.naametvaa pa~ncamiyaadiina.m maatikaabhaavena gahetabbaani. idaani pana tayogaadisahitaasahitavasena dvidhaa kriyaapadamaalaayo dassessaama kvacaadesavasena sambhuutaani ca ruupantaraani sotuuna.m sukhadhaara.nattha~nceva purisappayoge asammohattha~nca.

[03] bhavatu, bhavantu. bhavaahi, bhava, bhavatha. bhavaami, bhavaama. bhavata.m, bhavanta.m. bhavassu, bhavavho. bhave, bhavaamase. so bhavatu, te bhavantu. tva.m bhavaahi, bhava, tumhe bhavatha. aha.m bhavaami, maya.m bhavaama. so bhavata.m, te bhavanta.m. tva.m bhavassu, tumhe bhavavho. aha.m bhave, maya.m bhavaamase. aya.m pa~ncamiivibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.

[03] bhaveyya, bhave, bhaveyyu.m. bhaveyyaasi, bhaveyyaatha. bhaveyyaami, bhaveyyaama, bhavemu. bhavetha, bhavera.m. bhavetho, bhaveyyaavho. bhaveyya.m, bhaveyyaamhe iti vaa, so bhaveyya ^a^M0.0039^ea^, bhave, te bhaveyyu.m. tva.m bhaveyyaasi, tumhe bhaveyyaatha. aha.m bhaveyyaami, maya.m bhaveyyaama, bhavemu. so bhavetha, te bhavera.m. tva.m bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyaavho. aha.m bhaveyya.m, maya.m bhaveyyaamhe iti vaa. aya.m sattamiivibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.

[03] babhuuva, babhuuvu. babhuuve, babhuuvittha. babhuuva.m, babhuuvimha. babhuuvittha, babhuuvire. babhuuvittho, babhuuvivho. babhuuvi.m, babhuuvimhe iti vaa, so babhuuva, te babhuuvu. tva.m babhuuve, tumhe babhuuvittha. aha.m babhuuva.m, maya.m babhuuvimha. so babhuuvittha, te babhuuvire. tva.m babhuuvittho, tumhe babhuuvivho. aha.m babhuuvi.m, maya.m babhuuvimhe iti vaa. aya.m parokkhaavibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.

[03] abhavaa, abhavuu. abhavo, abhavattha. abhava.m, abhavamhaa. abhavattha, abhavatthu.m. abhavase, abhavavha.m. abhavi.m, abhavamhase iti vaa, so abhavaa, te abhavuu. tva.m abhavo, tumhe abhavattha. aha.m abhava.m, maya.m abhavamhaa. so abhavattha, te abhavatthu.m. tva.m abhavase, tumhe abhavavha.m. aha.m abhavi.m, maya.m abhavamhase iti vaa. aya.m hiyyattaniivibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.

[03] abhavi, abhavu.m. abhavo, abhavittha. abhavi.m, abhavimhaa. abhavaa, abhavuu. abhavase, abhavivha.m. abhavha.m, abhavimhe iti vaa, so abhavi, te abhavu.m. tva.m abhavo, tumhe abhavittha. aha.m abhavi.m, maya.m abhavimhaa. so abhavaa, te abhavuu. tva.m abhavase, tumhe abhavivha.m. aha.m abhava.m, maya.m abhavimhe iti vaa. aya.m ajjataniivibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.

[03] ettha panajjataniyaa ^b^u.m^eb^vacanassa ^b^i.msu^eb^maadesavasena bhavatino ruupantaraanipi veditabbaani. seyyathida.m? te bhavi.msu, samubbhavi.msu, pabhavi.msu, paraabhavi.msu, sambhavi.msu, paatubhavi.msu, paatubbhavi.msu ^a^M0.0040^ea^, imaani akammakapadaani. paribhavi.msu, abhibhavi.msu, adhibhavi.msu, atibhavi.msu, anubhavi.msu, samanubhavi.msu, abhisambhavi.msu.

[03] tatraaya.m paa.li -- ``eva.mvihaari~ncaavuso bhikkhu.m ruupaa adhibhosu.m, na bhikkhu ruupe adhibhosii''ti. imaani sakammakapadaani, evamajjataniyaa ^b^u.m^eb^vacanassa ^b^i.msu^eb^maadesavasena bhavatino ruupantaraani bhavanti. apica

[03] tatraaya.m paa.li -- so tena kammena diva.m samakkami, sukha~nca khi.d.daaratiyo ca anvabhiiti. tattha ^b^anvabhii^eb^ti anu abhiiti chedo. ^b^anuu^eb^ti upasaggo. ^b^abhii^eb^ti aakhyaatikapadanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] bhavissati, bhavissanti. bhavissasi, bhavissatha. bhavissaami, bhavissaama. bhavissate, bhavissante. bhavissase, bhavissavhe. bhavissa.m, bhavissaamhe iti vaa, so bhavissati, te bhavissanti. tva.m bhavissasi, tumhe bhavissatha. aha.m bhavissaami, maya.m bhavissaama. so bhavissate, te bhavissante. tva.m bhavissase, tumhe bhavissavhe. aha.m bhavissa.m, maya.m bhavissaamhe iti vaa. aya.m bhavissantiivibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.

[03] abhavissaa, abhavissa.msu. abhavisse, abhavissatha. abhavissa.m, abhavissaamhaa. abhavissatha, abhavissisu. abhavissase, abhavissavhe. abhavissi.m, abhavissaamhase iti vaa, so abhavissaa, te abhavissa.msu. tva.m abhavisse, tumhe ^a^M0.0041^ea^ abhavissatha. aha.m abhavissa.m, maya.m abhavissaamhaa. so abhavissatha, te abhavissisu. tva.m abhavissase, tumhe abhavissavhe. aha.m abhavissi.m, maya.m abhavissaamhase iti vaa. aya.m kaalaatipattivibhattivasena kriyaapadamaalaaniddeso.
[06] iti nava"nge saa.t.thakathe pi.takattaye byappathagatiisu vi~n~nuuna.m

[03] tattha atthuddhaaro, atthasaddacintaa, atthaatisayayogo, samaanaasamaanavasenavacanasa"ngaho, aagamalakkha.navasena vibhattivacanasa"ngaho, kaalavasena vibhattivacanasa"ngaho, kaalasa"ngaho, pakara.nasa.msandanaa, vattamaanaadiina.m vacanatthavibhaavanaa caati navadhaa vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] atthuddhaare taava samaanasutikapadaanamatthuddhaara.na.m karissaama. etthaakhyaatapadasa~n~nitaana.m ^b^bhoti^eb^sadda ^b^bhave^eb^saddaanamattho uddharitabbo. tathaa hete naamikapadasa~n~nitehi aparehi ^b^bhoti^eb^sadda ^b^bhave^eb^saddehi samaanasutikaapi asamaanatthaa ceva honti asamaanavibhattikaa ca. saasanasmi~nhi ^a^M0.0042^ea^ keci saddaa a~n~nama~n~na.m samaanasutikaa samaanaapi asamaanatthaa asamaanapavattinimittaa asamaanali"ngaa asamaanavibhattikaa asamaanavacanakaa asamaanantaa asamaanakaalikaa asamaanapadajaatikaa ca bhavanti.

[03] tesamasamaanatthatte ``sabba~nhi ta.m jiirati dehanissita.m. appassutaaya.m puriso, balibaddova jiirati. santo tasito. pahu santo na bharati. santo aacikkhate muni. santo sappurisaa loke. santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti evamaadayo payogaa. ettha ^b^jiirati^eb^saddadvaya.m yathaasambhava.m navabhaavaapagamava.d.dhanavaacaka.m. ^b^santo^eb^saddapa~ncaka.m yathaasambhava.m parissamappattasamaanopasantopalabbhamaanavaacakanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] asamaanapavattinimittatte pana ``akata~n~nuu mittadubbhii, assaddho akata~n~nuucaa''tievamaadayo. ettha ca ^b^akata~n~nuu^eb^saddadvaya.m kataakataajaananajaananapavattinimitta.m pa.ticca sambhuutattaa asamaanapavattinimittakanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] asamaanali"ngatte ``sukhii hotu pa~ncasikha sakko devaanamindo. tva~nca bhadde sukhii hohi. yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti. maataa me atthi, saa mayaa posetabbaa''ti evamaadayo. ettha ^b^sukhii^eb^saddadvaya.m ^b^saa^eb^saddadvaya~nca pumitthili"ngavasena asamaanali"nganti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] asamaanavibhattikatte ``aahaare udare yato. yato pajaanaati sahetudhamma''nti evamaadayo. ettha ^b^yatosa^eb^ddadvaya.m ^a^M0.0043^ea^ pa.thamaapa~ncamiivibhattisahitattaa asamaanavibhattikanti da.t.thabba.m.
[21] ``yaaya maatu bhato poso, ima.m loka.m avekkhati.
[22] tampi paa.nadadi.m santi.m, hanti kuddho puthujjano''ti
[22] vikkosamaanaa tibbaahi, hanti nesa.m vara.m vara''nti..

[07] aadiisu pana bahuvacano. ``siilavaa vattasampanno. etha tumhe aayasmanto siilavaa hotha. santo danto niyato brahmacaarii. santo have sabbhi pavedayanti. mahaaraajaa yasassii so. cattaaro mahaaraajaa''ti evamaadiisu ^b^siilavaa^eb^saddaadayo ekavacanabahuvacanakaa.

[03] asamaanantatte pana yattha samaanasutikaana.m asamaanavibhattikatta.m vaa asamaanavacanatta.m vaa upalabbhati. teyeva payogaa. ta.m yathaa? ``sata.m sampajaana.m, sata.m dhammo, santo danto, santo sappurisaa'' iccevamaadayo.

[03] asamaanakaalatte ``nanu te suta.m braahma.na bha~n~namaane, devaa na issanti purisaparakkamassa. te janaa paaramissanti, maccudheyya.m suduttara''nti evamaadayo. ettha ^b^issanti^eb^saddadvaya.m vattamaanaabhavissantiikaalavasena asamaanakaalanti da.t.thabba.m. vattamaanaabhavissantiivibhattivasena pana asamaanavibhattikantipi.

[03] asamaanapadajaatikatte ^a^M0.0044^ea^ ``saya.m samaahito naago, saya.m abhi~n~naaya kamuddiseyya.m. pathe dhaavantiyaa pati, eka.msa.m ajina.m katvaa, paadesu sirasaa pati. giri.m ca.n.dora.na.m patii''ti evamaadayo. ettha ^b^saya.m^eb^saddadvaya.m naamanipaatavasena ^b^pati^eb^saddattaya.m naamaakhyaatopasaggavasena asamaanapadajaatikanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] iminaa nayena sabbattha vitthaaretabba.m. eva.m saasanasmi.m keci saddaa a~n~nama~n~na.m samaanasutikaa samaanaapi asamaanatthaa asamaanapavattinimittaa asamaanali"ngaa asamaanavibhattikaa asamaanavacanakaa asamaanantaa asamaanakaalikaa asamaanapadajaatikaa ca bhavanti. etaadisesu saddesu yo kriyaapadatta.m pakaaseti, na so naamikapadatta.m. yo ca naamikapadatta.m pakaaseti, na so kriyaapadatta.m. eva.m santepi sutisaama~n~nato ekattena gahetvaa atthuddhaaro kara.niiyoti yathaavuttakriyaapadaana.m naamapadehi samaanasutikaana.m ^b^bhoti^eb^sadda ^b^bhave^eb^ saddaanamatthuddhaara.m vadaama.

[03] katha.m? ^b^bhoti^eb^saddo kattuyoge kriyaapada.m, kriyaayoge naamikapada.m, tasmaa so dviisu atthesu vattati kriyaapadatthe naamikapadatthe ca. tattha kriyaapadatthe vattamaanavasena, naamikapadatthe panaalapanavasena. kriyaapadatthe taava ``eko bhoti'', naamikapadatthe ``maa bhoti paridevesi''. atrida.m vuccati --

[03] ^b^bhave^eb^saddo ^a^M0.0045^ea^ pana ``bhavaamii''timassa vattamaanaavibhattiyuttassa saddassatthepi vattati. ``bhavaamii''timassa pa~ncamiivibhattiyuttassa saddassa aa.natyaasiisanatthesupi vattati. ``bhaveyyaamii''timassa sattamiivibhattisahitassa saddassa anumatiparikappatthesupi vattati. tatrida.m pa.thamatthassa saadhaka.m aahaccavacana.m --
[03] aya.m pana sabbesa.m tesamatthaana.m saadhikaa amhaaka.m gaathaaracanaa --
[21] ``sukhii bhavati eso ca, aha~ncaapi sukhii bhave.
[22] sukhii bhavatu eso ca, aha~ncaapi sukhii bhave..
[21] sukhii bhaveyya eso ca, aha~ncaapi sukhii bhave.
[22] sukhii bhaveyya ce eso, aha~ncaapi sukhii bhave''ti..
[22] ettha paa.lippadesa.m tu, aaharissa.m su.naatha me..
[22] ka.m tva.m atthavasa.m ~natvaa, eva.m vaayamase bhusa.m..
[21] nisamma vatta.m lokassa, vaayaamassa ca devate.

[03] evamaya.m ^b^bhave^eb^saddo pa~ncasu chasu vaa kriyaapadatthesu pavattati. tathaa sattamiivibhatyantanaamikapadassa vuddhisa.msaarakammabhavuupapattibhavasa"nkhaatesu atthesupi. tathaa hi ``abhave nandati tassa, bhave tassa na nandatii''tiaadiisu vuddhimhi. ``bhave vicaranto''tiaadiisu sa.msaare. ``bhave kho sati jaati hoti, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na''ntiaadiisu kammabhave. ``eva.m bhavevijjamaane''tiaadiisu upapattibhaveti da.t.thabba.m. iminaa nayena ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatuto nipphannaana.m a~n~natopi a~n~nesa.m kriyaapadaana.m yathaasambhavamattho uddharitabbo.

[03] atthasaddacintaaya.m pana evamupalakkhetabba.m -- ``bhavante, paraabhavante, paraabhave''iccaadayo ^b^gacchati gaccha.m gacchato^eb^saddaadayo viya visesasaddaa, na yaacanopataapanatthaadivaacako ^b^naathati^eb^saddo viya, na ca raajadevataadivaacako ^b^deva^eb^saddo viya saama~n~nasaddaa. ye cettha visesasaddaa, te sabbakaala.m visesasaddaava. ye ca saama~n~nasaddaa, tepi sabbakaala.m saama~n~nasaddaava.

[03] tatra ^b^gacchatii^eb^tiaadiina.m visesasaddataa eva.m da.t.thabbaa -- ^b^gacchatii^eb^ti eka.m naamapada.m, ekamaakhyaata.m. tathaa ^b^gaccha^eb^nti eka.m naamapada.m, ekamaakhyaata.m. ^b^gacchato^eb^ti eko kitanto, aparo ruu.lhiisaddo. satipi visesasaddatte sadisattaa sutisaama~n~nato tabbisaya.m buddhi.m nuppaadeti vinaava'tthappakara.nasaddantaraabhisambandhena. tathaa hi saddantaraabhisambandhena ``gacchati pati.t.thita''nti vutte sattamyanta.m naamapadanti vi~n~naayati. ``gacchati tisso''ti vutte panaakhyaatanti. tathaa ``sa gaccha.m na nivattatii''ti vutte pa.thamanta.m naamapadanti vi~n~naayati. ``gaccha.m puttanivedako''ti vutte aakhyaatanti vi~n~naayati. ``gacchato hayato patito''ti vutte kitantoti vi~n~naayati. ``gacchato pa.n.napupphaani patantii''ti vutte rukkhavaacako ruu.lhiisaddoti. iti visesasaddaana.m aakhyaatanaamaana.m naamaakhyaatehi samaanasutikaana.m atthaabhisambandhaadiisu yo koci atthavisesa~naapako sambandho avassamicchitabbo. eva.m ``gacchatii''tiaadiina.m aakhyaatanaamattaadivasena pacceka.m .thitaana.m ekekatthavaacakaana.m visesasaddataa da.t.thabbaa.

[03] ``naathati ^a^M0.0048^ea^ devo''tiaadiina.m pana aakhyaatanaamaana.m naamaakhyaatehi asamaanasutikaana.m anekatthavaacakaana.m saama~n~nasaddataa eva da.t.thabbaa. atthasambandhaadiisu hi vinaa yena kenaci sambandhena ``naathatii''ti vutte ``yaacatii''ti vaa ``upataapetii''ti vaa ``issariya.m karotii''ti vaa ``aasiisatii''ti vaa attho pa.tibhaati, tathaa ``devo''ti vutte ``megho''ti vaa ``aakaaso''ti vaa ``raajaa''ti vaa ``devataa''ti vaa ``visuddhidevo''ti vaa attho pa.tibhaati. yadaa pana saddantaraabhisambandhena ``naathati suppa.tipatti''nti vutte tadaa ``naathatii''ti kriyaapadassa ``yaacatii''ti attho vi~n~naayati, ``naathati sabbakilese''ti vutte ``upataapetii''ti attho vi~n~naayati. ``naathati sakacitte''ti vutte ``issariya.m karotii''ti attho vi~n~naayati. ``naathati lokassa hita''nti vutte ``aasiisatii''ti attho vi~n~naayati. tathaa ``devo gajjatii''ti vutte ``devo''ti naamapadassa ``megho''ti attho vi~n~naayati. ``viddho vigatavalaahako devo''ti vutte ``aakaaso''ti attho vi~n~naayati. ``pivatu devo paaniiya''nti vutte ``raajaa''ti attho vi~n~naayati. ``devo devakaayaa cavati aayusa"nkhayaa''ti vutte ``devataa''ti attho vi~n~naayati. ``devaatidevo satapu~n~nalakkha.no''ti vutte ``visuddhidevo''ti attho vi~n~naayati. iminaa nayena a~n~nepi saama~n~nasaddaa ~naatabbaa.

[03] sabbameta.m ~natvaa yathaa attho saddena, saddo catthena na virujjhati, tathaatthasaddaa cintaniiyaa. tatrida.m upalakkha.namatta.m cintaakaaranidassana.m -- ``atthakusalaa bhavante''ti vaa ``kiccaani bhavante''ti vaa vutte ``bhavante''ti ida.m ``bhavantii''timinaa samaanatthamaakhyaatapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``bhavante passaamii''ti vaa ``icchaamii''ti vaa vutte upayogatthava.m ^a^M0.0049^ea^ naamapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``bhavante jane pasa.msatii''ti vaa ``kaametii''ti vaa vutte paccattopayogatthavantaani dve naamapadaaniiti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``coraa paraabhavante''ti vutte ``paraabhavante''ti ida.m ``paraabhavantii''timinaa samaanatthamaakhyaatikapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``paraabhavante janaa icchanti amittaana''nti vutte ``paraabhavante''ti imaani upayogapaccattatthavantaani dve naamapadaaniiti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``eso paraabhave''ti vutte ``paraabhave''ti ida.m ``paraabhaveyyaa''timinaa samaanatthamaakhyaatapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``ete paraabhave loke, pa.n.dito samavekkhiyaa''ti vutte ``paraabhave''ti ida.m upayogatthava.m bahuvacana.m naamapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``paraabhave satii''ti vutte bhaavalakkha.nabhummatthekavacanaka.m naamapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``tumhe me pasaadaa sambhave''ti vutte ``sambhave''ti ida.m ``sambhavathaa''timinaa samaanatthamaakhyaatapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``ehi tva.m sambhavavhe''ti vutte ``sambhavavhe''ti ida.m sambhavaaya naama itthiyaa vaacaka.m itthili"nga.m saalapana.m naamikapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``ehi tva.m sambhavavhepati.t.thita''nti vutte sambhavanaamakassa purisassa vaacaka.m pulli"nga.m bhummavacananti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo.

[07] hi paa.li. ``dhammaa paatubhavante''ti vutte ``paatubhavante''ti ida.m ``paatubhavantii''timinaa samaanattha.m sanipaatamaakhyaatapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``paatu bhavante jane''ti vutte ``te jane bhava.m rakkhatuu''ti atthavaacakaani aakhyaatakitantasabbanaamikapadaaniiti ^a^M0.0050^ea^ evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``paatubhavase tva.m gu.nehii''ti vutte ``paatubhavase''ti ida.m ``paatubhavasii''timinaa samaanatthamaakhyaatapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``paatubhavase gu.ne yo tva''nti vutte ``paatubhavaahi attano gu.nahetu tva''nti atthavaacakaaninipaatayuttaakhyaatanaamapadaaniiti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``ahamattano gu.nehi paatubhave''ti vutte ``paatubhave''ti ida.m ``paatubhavaamii''timinaa samaanattha.m sanipaatamaakhyaatapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. ``ma.m paatu bhave ida.m pu~n~nakamma''nti vutte ``ma.m rakkhatu sa.msaare ida.m pu~n~nakamma''nti atthavaacakaani aakhyaatanaamapadaaniiti evamattho ca saddo ca cintaniiyo. iminaa nayena sabbattha yathaarahamatthasaddaa cintaniiyaa. tattha samaanasutikaana.m kesa~nci saddaana.m ``na tesa.m ko.t.the openti. na tesa.m antaraa gacche. satta vo licchavii aparihaaniiye dhamme desessaami, ime te deva sattavo, tva~nca uttamasattavo''tiaadiisu samaanasutikaana.m viya uccaara.naviseso icchaniiyo. uccaara.navisese hi sati padaani paribyattaani, padesu paribyattesu attho paribyatto hoti, atthapariggaahakaana.m atthaadhigamo akiccho hoti, suparisuddhaadaasatale pa.tibimbadassana.m viya, so ca gahitapubbasa"nketassa atthasambandhaadiisu a~n~natarasmi.m ~naateyeva hoti, na itarathaa. vutta~nheta.m poraa.nehi --
[22] na padamattato atthe, te a~n~naataa pakaasakaa''ti..
[03] yadidamettha vuttamamhehi ``uccaara.naviseso icchaniiyo''ti. atraayamuccaara.navisesadiipanii gaathaa sahatthappakaasananayadaanagaathaaya.
[21] ``na ^a^M0.0051^ea^ te sa.m ko.t.the openti'', iti paa.the sumedhaso.
[22] pada.m ``na te''ti chinditvaa, ``sa.m ko.t.the''ti pa.theyya ve..
[21] ``sa.m na openti ko.t.the te, bhikkhuu''ti atthamiiraye.

[03] atha ya.m panidampi vutta.m ``kesa~ncii''ti, ta.m kimattha.m? ``gacchati pati.t.thita.m, gacchati tisso, bhavante passaami, atthakusalaa bhavante, vadanta.m ekapokkharaa, vadanta.m pa.tivadatii''tiaadiisu samaanasutikaanamuccaara.naviseso na labbhatiiti dassanattha.m. tasmaa idamettha sallakkhetabba.m -- yattha samaanasutikaanamuccaara.naviseso labbhati atthaviseso ca padaana.m vibhaagavasena vaa avibhaagavasena vaa, tattha payoge samaanasutikamekacca.m pada.m vicchinditvaa uccaaretabba.m. seyyathida.m? ``hetu hetusampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. so tena saddhi.m bhaasati, sotena vuyhati. bhavante jane pasa.msati, bhavante passaamii''ti evamaadayo payogaa. ettha ``hetuu''ti iisaka.m vicchinditvaa ``hetusampayuttaana''nti uccaaretabba.m. tathaa ``so''ti vicchinditvaa ``tena saddhi''nti uccaaretabba.m. ``bhava''nti vicchinditvaa ``te jane''ti uccaaretabba.m.

[03] sesa.m pana samaanasutika.m vicchinditvaa na uccaaretabba.m. avicchindaniiyasmi~nhi .thaane vicchinditvaa pa.thitassa attho du.t.tho hoti. eva.m padavibhaagaavibhaagavasena samaanasutikaanamatthuccaara.naviseso veditabbo. ettha hi ``so tenaa''tiaadiisu dvipadatthaggaha.na.m vibhaago, ekapadatthaggaha.namavibhaagoti adhippeto. ettha ca visu.m vavatthitaana.m asamaanasutikaana.m ekato katvaa samaanasutikabhaavaparikappana.m atthantaravi~n~naapanattha~nceva uccaara.navisesadassanattha~nca. na hi etaani ^a^M0.0052^ea^ ``sappo sappo''tiaadiisu viya ekasmi.myevatthe samaanasutikaani. eva.m santepi ekajjhakara.nena laddha.m samaanasutilesa.m gahetvaa atthantaravi~n~naapanattha.m uccaara.navisesadassanattha~nca ``samaanasutikaanii''ti vuttaani. esa nayo a~n~natraapi iidisesu .thaanesu. idamettha sallakkhetabba.m --

[03] yattha samaanasutikaana.m a.t.thaarasaakaaresu yena kenaci aakaarena atthaviseso labbhati, vicchinditvaa pana uccaara.ne saddavilaaso na hoti, attho vaa du.t.tho hoti, na taadisesu payogesu samaanasutikaani padaani vicchinditvaa uccaaretabbaani. tatra katamena caakaarena atthavisesalaabho bhavati? padaana.m vibhaagavasena vaa avibhaagavasena vaa akkharasannidhaanavasena vaa padasannidhaanavasena vaa padakkharasannidhaanavasena vaa vicchaavasena vaa kammappavacaniiyavasena vaa bhayakodhaadiisu uppannesu kathitaame.ditavacanavasena vaa gu.navaacakasaddassa dviruttavasena vaa kriyaapadassa dviruttavasena vaa sa.mhitaapadacchedavasena vaa agaaravatthaparidiipanavasena vaa nirantaratthaparidiipanavasena vaa nanirantaratthaparidiipanavasena vaa ``punappuna''miccatthaparidiipanavasena vaa upamaane ^b^iva^eb^ saddavasena vaa ^b^iti^eb^sadda.m pa.ticca saddapadatthavaacakatthaparidiipanavasena vaa tathaapavattacittaparidiipanavasena vaati imesu.t.thaarasaakaaresu, vitthaarato pana chabbiisaaya aakaaresu tato vaadhikesu yena kenaci aakaarena atthavisesalaabho bhavati.

[03] ettha padaana.m taava vibhaagavasena vaa avibhaagavasena vaa samaanasutikaanamatthavisesalaabhe ``saa na.m sa"ngati paaleti, abhikkamo saana.m pa~n~naayati. maa no deva avadhi, maano mayha.m na vijjatii''ti evamaadayo payogaa.

[03] akkharasannidhaanavasena ^a^M0.0053^ea^ pana atthavisesalaabhe ``santehi mahito hito. sa"ngaa sa"ngaamaji.m mutta.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na.m. daa.thii daa.thiisu pakkhandi, ma~n~namaano yathaa pure. sabbaabhibhu.mva sirasaasirasaa namaami. bhuumito u.t.thitaa yaava, brahmalokaa vidhaavati. acci accimato loke, .dayhamaanamhi tejasaa''ti evamaadayo payogaa.

[03] padasannidhaanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``aapo aapogata.m. raajaraajamahaamattaadayo, sukho'lokassa lokassa, kaarako ~naa.nacakkhudo, niraapade pade ninno, ananta~naa.na.m karu.naalaya.m laya.m, malassa buddha.m susamaahita.m hita.m. namaami dhamma.m bhavasa.mvara.m vara.m, gu.naakara~nceva nira"nga.na.m ga.na''nti evamaadayo payogaa.

[03] padakkharasannidhaanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``pamaa.narahita.m hita.m, siddhattho sabbasiddhattho, tilokamahito hito. upagantvaana sambuddho, ida.m vacanamabravii''ti evamaadayo payogaa. tatrimaa akkharasannidhaanaadiisu adhippaayavi~n~naapaniyo gaathaa --
[03] vicchaavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``gaame gaame sata.m kumbhaa, gaamo gaamo rama.niiyo''ti evamaadayo payogaa. ettha hi vicchaavasena sabbepi gaamaa pariggahitaa.
[03] kammappavacaniiyavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``rukkha.m rukkha.m pati vijjotate cando, rukkha.m rukkha.m pari vijjotate cando''ti payogaa, rukkhaana.m upari upari vijjotateti attho.

[03] bhayakodhaadiisu uppannesu kathitaame.ditavacanavasena pana atthavisesalaabhe ime payogaa -- bhaye taava ``coro coro, sappo sappo''iccaadayo. kodhe ``vasala vasala, ca.n.daala ca.n.daala, vijjha vijjha, pahara pahara''iccaadayo. pasa.msaaya.m ``saadhu saadhu saariputta, abhikkanta.m bhante abhikkanta.m bhante''iccaadayo. turite ``abhikkama vaase.t.tha abhikkama vaase.t.tha, gaccha gaccha, lunaahi lunaahi''iccaadayo. kotuuhale ``aagaccha aagaccha''iccaadayo. acchariye ``aho buddho aho buddho''iccaadayo. haase ``aho sukha.m aho sukha.m, aho manaapa.m aho manaapa.m''iccaadayo. soke ``kaha.m ekaputtaka kaha.m ekaputtaka''iccaadayo. pasaade ``bhavissanti vajjii bhavissanti vajjii''iccaadayo. eva.m bhayakodhaadiisu uppannesu kathitaame.ditavacanavasena atthavisesalaabho bhavati. ettha pana atthantaraabhaavepi da.lhiikammavasena padaanamatthajotakabhaavoyeva atthavisesalaabho.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena garahaaasammaanaadiina.m sa"ngaho da.t.thabbo. ``paapo paapo''tiaadiisu hi garahaaya.m. ``abhiruupaka abhiruupakaa''tiaadiisu asammaane. ``kvaaya.m abalabalo viyaa''tiaadiisu atisayatthe aame.dita.m da.t.thabba.m. gu.navaacakassa dviruttavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``ka.nho ka.nho ca ghoro caa''ti evamaadayo. ``ka.nho ka.nho''ti hi atiiva ka.nhoti attho. kriyaapadassa dviruttavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``dhame dhame naatidhame''ti evamaadayo. tattha ^b^dhame dhame^eb^ti dhameyya no na dhameyya. ^b^naatidhame^eb^ti pamaa.naatikkanta.m pana na dhameyya. sa.mhitaapadacchedavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``naraanaraa, suraasuraa, kataakatakusalaakusalavisaya.m vippa.tisaaraakaarena pavatta.m anusocana.m kukkucca''nti evamaadayo. ettha pana vi~n~nuuna.m paramakosallajananattha.m siloka.m racayaama --

[03] agaaravatthaparidiipanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``tuva.mtuva.m pesu~n~nakalahaviggahavivaadaa''ti evamaadayo. nirantaratthaparidiipanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``divase divase paribhu~njatii''ti evamaadayo. nanirantaratthaparidiipanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ^a^M0.0056^ea^ ``kha.ne kha.ne piiti uppajjatii''ti evamaadayo. ``punappuna''miccatthaparidiipanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``muhu.m muhu.m bhaayayate kumaare''ti evamaadayo. upamaane ^b^iva^eb^saddavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``raajaa rakkhatu dhammena, attanova paja.m paja''nti evamaadayo. ^b^iti^eb^sadda.m pa.ticca saddapadatthavaacakattaparidiipanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``buddho buddhoti kathayanto, somanassa.m pavedayi''nti evamaadayo. tathaapavattacittaparidiipanavasena atthavisesalaabhe ``buddho buddhoti cintento, magga.m sodhemaha.m tadaa''ti evamaadayo. eva.m iidisesu payogesu samaanasutikapada.m vicchinditvaa na uccaaretabba.m. vicchinditvaa hi uccaara.ne sati saddavilaaso na bhavati, katthaci pana ``kataakataakusalaakusalavisaya''nti evamaadiisu vicchinditvaa uccaaritassa attho du.t.tho hoti, tasmaa vicchinditvaa na uccaaretabba.m, ekaabaddha.myeva katvaa uccaaretabba.m. iti samaanasutikesu vinicchayo chabbiisaaya aakaarehi adhikehi ca ma.n.detvaa dassito.

[03] yasmaa pana samaanasutikesu vinicchaye dassite asamaanasutikesupi vinicchayo dassetabbo hoti, tasmaa tampi dassessaama -- yattha niggahiitamhaa paraakaaralopopi paa.tho pa~n~naayati, sa.myogabya~njanassa visa.myogattampi. tesu payogesu niggahiitapada.m anantarapadena saddhi.m ekaabaddha.myeva katvaa uccaaretabba.m. katamaani taani? ``sace bhutto bhaveyyaaha.m-saa'jiivo garahito mama. puppha.m'saa uppajji. khayamatta.m na nibbaana.m'sa gambhiiraadivaacato''ti evamaadayo. ettha hi ``sace bhutto bhaveyyaaha''ntiaadinaa vicchedamakatvaa ^a^M0.0057^ea^ anantare dviisu gaathaapadesu antariibhuutaana.m dvinna.m samaanasutikapadaana.m ekato uccaara.namiva anantarapadehi saddhi.m ekaabaddhuccaara.navasena ``sace bhutto bhaveyyaaha.m-saa'jiivo garahito mamaa''tiaadinaa uccaaretabba.m. evaruupoyeva hi uccaara.naviseso sakalehipi poraa.nehi vi~n~nuuhi anumato uccaarito ca ``assa aajiivo garahito mama, assaa uppajji, assa gambhiiraadivaacato''tievamaadiatthappa.tipaadanassaanuruupattaa.

[03] yattha pana yaadise uccaara.ne kariyamaane attho paribyatto hoti, tesu payogesu kvaci ^b^ca^eb^sadda ^b^pana^eb^saddaadiyoga.t.thaane iisaka.m vicchinditvaa padamuccaaretabba.m. seyyathida.m? ``vaa.laa ca lapasakkharaa. accantasantaa pana yaa, aya.m nibbaanasampadaa, ``ida.m dukkha''nti vaaca.m bhaasato ``ida.m dukkha''nti ~naa.na.m pavattatiiti? aamantaa. ^b^i^eb^ti ca ^b^da^eb^nti ca ^b^du^eb^ti ca ^b^kha^eb^nti ca ~naa.na.m pavattatiiti? na heva.m vattabbe''ti evamaadayo payogaa.

[03] etesu hi pa.thamapayoge ``vaa.laa caa''ti iisaka.m vicchinditvaa ``lapasakkharaa''ti uccaaretabba.m. tattha ^b^lapasakkharaa^eb^ti sakkharasadisamadhuravacanaa. ^b^jaataka.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ pana ``niratthakavacanehi sakkharaa viya madhuraa''ti vutta.m, tasmaatra bahubbiihitappurisavasena dvidhaa samaaso da.t.thabbo ``lapaa sakkharaa viya yaasa.m taa lapasakkharaa, lapehi vaa sakkharaa viyaati lapasakkharaa''ti.
[03] dutiyapayoge ``accantasantaa pana''iti iisaka.m vicchinditvaa ``yaa''ti uccaaretabba.m. yaa pana aya.m nibbaanasampadaa accantasantaati hi attho.

[03] tatiyapayoge ^a^M0.0058^ea^ ^b^i^eb^ti ca ^b^da^eb^nti ca ^b^du^eb^ti ca ^b^kha^eb^nti caati etesu catuusu .thaanesu ikaara~nca ^b^da.m^eb^kaara~nca ^b^du^eb^kaara~nca ^b^kha.m^eb^kaara~nca iisaka.m vicchinditvaa tadanantara.m ^b^ti ca^eb^ saddaa uccaaretabbaa.

[03] ettha hi avicchinditvaa uccaara.ne sati a~n~nathaa gahetabbattaa attho du.t.tho bhavati. katha.m? iidisesu .thaanesu avicchinditvaa uccaara.ne sati ^b^iti^eb^saddo evanti atthavaacako nipaato siyaa, sandhivasena pana ^b^i^eb^kaaratthavaacako ruu.lhiisaddo na siyaa. ^b^danti^eb^saddo damanattho siyaa, ^b^da.m^eb^kaaravaacako na siyaa. ^b^duti^eb^saddo niratthako siyaa, ^b^du^eb^kaaravaacako na siyaa. ^b^khanti^eb^saddo khamanattho siyaa, ^b^kha.m^eb^kaaravaacako na siyaa. tasmaa ^b^i^eb^kaara ^b^da.m^eb^kaara ^b^du^eb^kaara ^b^kha.m^eb^kaaraani iisaka.m vicchinditabbaani.

[03] ettha hi ^b^i^eb^iti ^b^da.m^eb^iti ^b^du^eb^iti ^b^kha.m^eb^itiitiaadinaa sa.mhitaapadacchedo veditabbo, parabhuutassa ca ^b^i^eb^kaarassa lopo. na panettha ida.m vattabba.m ``saruupasaraana.m visaye parabhuutassa saruupasarassa lopo na hoti, pubbasarasseva lopo hoti tatraayanti ettha viyaa''ti ``akilaasuno va.n.napathe kha.nantaa, uda"nga.ne tattha papa.m avindu''nti paa.liya.m saruupaparasarassa lopadassanato. tathaa hi a.t.thakathaacariyehi ``pavaddha.m aapa.m papa''nti attho sa.mva.n.nito. tasmaa ``iti caa''ti etthaapi ^b^i^eb^iti caati cheda.m katvaa dviisu ikaaresu parassa ^b^i^eb^kaarassa lopo kaatabbo, na pubbassa.

[03] pubbasmi~nhi ^b^i^eb^kaaravaacake ^b^i^eb^kaare na.t.the sati nipaatabhuutena ^b^iti^eb^saddena ^b^i^eb^kaarasa"nkhaato attho na vi~n~naayeyya, nipaatabhuutassa pana ^b^iti^eb^saddassa ^b^i^eb^kaare na.t.thepi so attho vi~n~naayateva ``devadattoti me suta''nti ettha ^a^M0.0059^ea^ devadattapadattho viya. tasmaa ^b^iti^eb^saddassa parabhuutassa ^b^i^eb^kaarasseva lopo kaatabbo, na pubbassa ^b^i^eb^kaaravaacakassa ^b^i^eb^kaarassa. kaccaayane pana yebhuyyappavatti.m sandhaaya asaruupasarato parasseva asaruupasarassa lopo vutto, na saruupasarato parassa saruupasarassa. mahaapadesasuttehi vaa saruupassa parasarassa lopo vuttoti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca naa.landa''ntiaadiisu pana ^b^ca^eb^saddaadiyoga.t.thaanepi sati vicchinditvaa pada.m na uccaaretabba.m. yattha ca aagamakkharaadiini dissanti, tesu payogesu pubbapadaani vicchinditvaa na uccaaretabbaani, aagamakkharavantehi parapadehi saddhi.myeva uccaaretabbaani. seyyathida.m? ``nakkhattaraajaariva taarakaana.m. bhagavaa etadavoca''iccevamaadayo payogaa. yattha yesa.m visu.m visu.m sambandho dissati, attho ca yujjati, tattha taani atthaanuruupa.m vicchinditvaa uccaaretabbaani. seyyathida.m? ``nahaane ussukka.m akaasi, ussukkampi akaasi yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m'' iccevamaadayo payogaa. ettha hi ``nahaane ussukka.m akaasii''ti vicchinditvaa ``ussukkampi akaasi yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi''nti uccaaretabba.m. eva~nhi sati na kevala.m so bhikkhu nahaaneyeva ussukka.m akaasi, atha kho yaaguyaapi khaadaniiyepi bhattasmimpi ussukka.m akaasiiti atthappakaasane samattho bhavati, a.t.thaanappayutto samuccayatthavaacako ^b^api^eb^saddo.

[03] yattha pana yesamitarena vaa itarena vaa ekekapadena ubhayapadehi vaa sambandho dissati sahevatthayuttiyaa, tattha taani yathaaraha.m vicchinditvaa uccaaretabbaani. seyyathida.m? ``so dhamma.m desetiaadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m ^a^M0.0060^ea^ pakaaseti. pa.ticcasamuppaada.m vo bhikkhave desessaami, ta.m su.naatha saadhuka.m manasikarotha. ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava''nti evamaadayo payogaa. tatrimaa adhippaayavi~n~naapikaa gaathaa --
[21] nattanomatiyaa eso, attho ettha mayaa ruto.
[22] cintayitvaana medhaavii, vohare na yathaa tathaati..

[03] atthaatisayayoge eva.m upalakkhetabba.m -- ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatuatthaatisayayogato va.d.dhane di.t.thaa ``ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo licchavii udaana.m udaanesi `bhavissanti vajjii bhavissanti vajjii'ti'' iti vaa ``ahameva duusiyaa bhuunahataa, ra~n~no mahaapataapassaa''ti vaa ``vedaa na taa.naaya bhavantidassa, mittadduno bhuunahuno narassaa''ti vaa ``bhuunahacca.m kata.m mayaa''ti vaa eva.m va.d.dhane di.t.thaa.

[03] vacanasa"ngahe ^a^M0.0061^ea^ eva.m upalakkhetabba.m -- vattamaanaaya vibhattiyaa parassapada.m majjhimapurisabahuvacana.m pa~ncamiyaa parassapadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena sadisa.m. tumhe bhavatha.
[03] vattamaanapa~ncamiina.m parassapade uttamapurisacatukke ekavacana.m ekavacanena, bahuvacanampi bahuvacanena sadisa.m. aha.m bhavaami, maya.m bhavaama.

[03] vattamaanaaya attanopada.m majjhimapurisekavacana.m hiyyattanajjataniina.m attanopadehi dviihi majjhimapurisekavacanehi sadisa.m katthaci va.n.nasamudaayavasena ki~nci visesa.m vajjetvaa, esa nayo uttaratraapi yojetabbo. tva.m bhavase, ida.m vattamaanaaya ruupa.m. tva.m abhavase, ida.m hiyyattanajjataniina.m ruupa.m.

[03] vattamaanaaya attanopada.m uttamapurisekavacana.m pa~ncamiyaa attanopadenuttamapurisekavacanena ca parokkhaaya parassapadena majjhimapurisekavacanena caati dviihi vacanehi sadisa.m. aha.m bhave, ida.m vattamaanapa~ncamiina.m ruupa.m. tva.m babhuuve, ida.m parokkhaaya ruupa.m.

[03] vattamaanaaya attanopada.m uttamapurisabahuvacana.m parokkhajjataniina.m attanopadehi dviihi uttamapurisabahuvacanehi sadisa.m. maya.m bhavaamhe, ida.m vattamaanaaya ruupa.m. maya.m babhuuvimhe, ida.m parokkhaaya ruupa.m. maya.m abhavimhe, idamajjataniyaa ruupa.m.

[03] pa~ncamiyaa attanopada.m majjhimapurisabahuvacana.m parokkhaaya attanopadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena sadisa.m. tumhe bhavavho, ida.m pa~ncamiyaa ruupa.m. tumhe babhuuvivho, ida.m parokkhaaya ruupa.m.

[03] parokkhaaya parassapada.m pa.thamapurisabahuvacana.m hiyyattaniyaa parassapadena pa.thamapurisabahuvacanena ca ajjataniyaa attanopadena pa.thamapurisabahuvacanena caati dviihi vacanehi sadisa.m. te babhuuvu, ida.m parokkhaaya ruupa.m. te abhavu, ida.m hiyyattanajjataniina.m ruupa.m.

[03] parokkhaaya ^a^M0.0062^ea^ parassapada.m majjhimapurisabahuvacana.m attanopadena pa.thamapurisekavacanena ca hiyyattaniyaa parassapadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena ca attanopadena pa.thamapurisekavacanena ca ajjataniyaa parassapadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena caati catuuhi vacanehi sadisa.m. tumhe babhuuvittha, so babhuuvittha, imaani parokkhaaya ruupaani. tumhe abhavattha, so abhavattha, imaani hiyyattaniyaa ruupaani. tumhe abhavittha, idamajjataniyaa ruupa.m.

[03] parokkhaaya parassapada.m uttamapurisekavacana.m hiyyattaniyaa parassapadenuttamapurisekavacanena ca ajjataniyaa attanopadenuttamapurisekavacanena caati dviihi vacanehi sadisa.m. aha.m babhuuva.m, ida.m parokkhaaya ruupa.m. aha.m abhava.m, ida.m hiyyattanajjataniina.m ruupa.m.

[03] parokkhaaya parassapada.m uttamapurisabahuvacana.m hiyyattaniyaa parassapadenuttamapurisabahuvacanena sadisa.m. maya.m babhuuvimha, ida.m parokkhaaya ruupa.m. maya.m abhavamha, ida.m hiyyattaniyaa ruupa.m.

[03] parokkhaaya attanopadauttamapurisekavacana.m hiyyattaniyaa attanopadenuttamapurisekavacanena ca ajjataniyaa parassapadenuttamapurisekavacanena caati dviihi vacanehi sadisa.m. aha.m babhuuvi.m, ida.m parokkhaaya ruupa.m. aha.m abhavi.m, ida.m hiyyattanajjataniina.m ruupa.m.
[03] hiyyattaniyaa parassapada.m pa.thamapurisekavacana.m ajjataniyaa attanopadena pa.thamapurisekavacanena sadisa.m. so abhavaa.
[03] hiyyattaniyaa parassapada.m majjhimapurisekavacana.m ajjataniyaa parassapadena majjhimapurisekavacanena sadisa.m. tva.m abhavo.

[03] bhavissantiyaa parassapada.m majjhimapurisabahuvacana.m kaalaatipattiyaa parassapadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena attanopadena pa.thamapurisekavacanena caati dviihi vacanehi sadisa.m. tumhe ^a^M0.0063^ea^ bhavissatha, ida.m bhavissantiyaa ruupa.m. tumhe abhavissatha, so abhavissatha, imaani kaalaatipattiyaa ruupaani.

[03] bhavissantiyaa attanopada.m majjhimapurisekavacana.m kaalaatipattiyaa attanopadena majjhimapurisekavacanena sadisa.m. tva.m bhavissase, ida.m bhavissantiyaa ruupa.m. tva.m abhavissase, ida.m kaalaatipattiyaa ruupa.m.

[03] bhavissantiyaa attanopada.m majjhimapurisabahuvacana.m kaalaatipattiyaa attanopadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena sadisa.m. tumhe bhavissavhe, ida.m bhavissantiyaa ruupa.m. tumhe abhavissavhe, ida.m kaalaatipattiyaa ruupa.m.

[03] bhavissantiyaa attanopada.m uttamapurisekavacana.m kaalaatipattiyaa parassapadenuttamapurisekavacanena sadisa.m. aha.m bhavissa.m, ida.m bhavissantiyaa ruupa.m. aha.m abhavissa.m, ida.m kaalaatipattiyaa ruupa.m. sesaani sabbaasama.t.thanna.m vibhattiina.m vacanaani a~n~nama~n~na.m visadisaaniiti da.t.thabba.m. bhavanti catra --
[22] ^b^e^eb^ttaya.m lapita.m tattha, aado dvinna.m vasena tu..
[27] bavhattekattato vutta.m, majjhimo pa.thamo ca so.
[22] imaani tu payogaani, tattha vi~n~nuu pakaasaye..
[22] eta.m naya.m gahetvaana, vade sabbattha sambhavaati..

[03] kaalavasena pana vibhattivacanasa"ngahe duvidho sa"ngaho kaalattayavasena sa"ngaho, kaalachakkavasena sa"ngaho caati. tattha vattamaanaapa~ncamiisattamiivibhattiyo paccuppannakaalikaa, vattamaanaapa~ncamiisattamiivibhatyantaani padaani paccuppannavacanaani. parokkhaahiyyattanajjataniivibhattiyo atiitakaalikaa, parokkhaahiyyattanajjataniivibhatyantaani padaani atiitavacanaani. bhavissantiivibhatti anaagatakaalikaa, bhavissantiivibhatyantaani padaani anaagatavacanaani. kaalaatipattivibhatti pana katthaci atiitakaalikaa katthaci anaagatakaalikaa, tasmaa tadantaani padaani atiitavacanaanipi anaagatavacanaanipi honti. aya.m kaalattayavasena vibhattivacanasa"ngaho.

[03] aya.m pana kaalachakkavasena vibhattivacanasa"ngaho -- parokkhaahiyyattanajjataniivibhattiyo atiitakaalikaa, parokkhaahiyyattanajjataniivibhatyantaani padaani atiitavacanaani. bhavissantiivibhatti anaagatakaalikaa, bhavissantiivibhatyantaani padaani anaagatavacanaani. vattamaanaavibhatti paccuppannakaalikaa, vattamaanaavibhatyantaani padaani paccuppannavacanaani. pa~ncamiivibhatti aa.nattikaalikaa ^a^M0.0068^ea^, pa~ncamiivibhatyantaani padaani aa.nattivacanaani. sattamiivibhatti parikappakaalikaa, sattamiivibhatyantaani padaani parikappavacanaani. ettha pana ``aa.nattivacanaanii''ti ca ``parikappavacanaanii''ti ca ida.m tathaasiisamatta.m aasi.t.thaanumatyaadiisu pa~ncamyaadiina.m dissanato. kaalaatipattivibhatti kaalaatipattikaalikaa, kaalaatipattivibhatyantaani padaani kaalaatipattivacanaani. eva.m kaalachakkavasena vibhattivacanasa"ngaho veditabbo.
[03] kaalasa"ngahe tividho kaalasa"ngaho kaalattayasa"ngaho kaalacatukkasa"ngaho kaalachakkasa"ngaho caati.
[21] nanu kaccaayane ganthe, kaalo vutto catubbidho.
[22] na kaalato vinimutta.m, aakhyaata.m ki~nci dissati..
[21] nanu caavuttakaaleti, attho tatra tu yujjati.
[22] paccuppanne bhavantiiti, na tathaa tattha bhaasitaa..
[21] kasmaati ce aa.naapana.m, parikappo ca saccato.
[22] paccuppanne yato atthaa, nipphannaa dissare ime..
[21] atthaana.m gamanaadiina.m, nipphatti na tu dissati.
[21] kaalo vaa vuttakaaloti, icceva.m gahito idha.
[21] eva.m tidhaa catudhaapi, vutto kaalaana sa"ngaho.
[22] chadhaa idaani kaalaana.m, sa"ngaho naama niyyate..
[22] samaanaa pa~ncamii hoti, tasmaa saa pa~ncamii mataa..
[21] sattamii pana ki~ncaapi, samaanaa taahi sattamaa.
[22] hoti yasmaa tato vuttaa, sattamiitveva no mati..

[03] atrida.m kaalaatipattiyaa atiitavacana.m -- ``sacaaya.m bhikkhave raajaa pitara.m dhammika.m dhammaraajaana.m jiivitaa na voropessatha, imasmi.myevassa aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu ^a^M0.0071^ea^ uppajjissathaa''ti. ``passaananda ima.m mahaadhanase.t.thiputta.m imasmi.myeva nagare dveasiitiko.tidhana.m khepetvaa bhariya.m aadaaya bhikkhaaya caranta.m. sace hi aya.m pa.thamavaye bhoge akhepetvaa kammante payojayissaa, imasmi.myeva nagare aggase.t.thi abhavissaa. sace pana nikkhamitvaa pabbajissaa, arahatta.m paapu.nissaa, bhariyaapissa anaagaamiphale pati.t.thahissaa. sace majjhimavaye bhoge akhepetvaa kammante payojayissaa, dutiyase.t.thi abhavissaa. nikkhamitvaa pabbajanto anaagaamii abhavissaa, bhariyaapissa sakadaagaamiphale pati.t.thahissaa. sace pacchimavaye bhoge akhepetvaa kammante payojayissaa, tatiyase.t.thi abhavissaa. nikkhamitvaa pabbajanto sakadaagaamii abhavissaa, bhariyaapissa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahissaa'' iti vaa, ``sace satthaa agaara.m ajjhaavasissaa, cakkavattiraajaa abhavissaa. raahulasaama.nero pari.naayakaratana.m, therii itthiratana.m, sakalacakkavaa.larajja.m etesa~n~neva abhavissaa'' iti vaa eva.m kaalaatipattiyaa atiitavacana.m bhavati.

[03] katha.m kaalaatipattiyaa anaagatavacana.m bhavati? ``cirampi bhakkho abhavissaa, sace na vivadaamase. asiisaka.m ana"ngu.t.tha.m, si"ngaalo harati rohita.m''itivaa, ``sace aananda naalabhissaa maatugaamo tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja.m, cira.t.thitika.m aananda brahmacariya.m abhavissaa''ti iti vaa, ``aya.m a"ngulimaalassa maataa `a"ngulimaala.m aanessaamii'ti gacchati, sace samaagamissati, a"ngulimaalo `a"ngulisahassa.m puuressaamii'ti maatara.m maaressati. sacaaha.m na gamissaami, mahaajaaniko abhavissaa'' iti vaa eva.m kaalaatipattiyaa anaagatavacana.m bhavati ^a^M0.0072^ea^. kaccaayane pana yebhuyyena atiitappavatti.m sandhaaya kaalaatipattivibhattiyaa atiitakaalikataa vuttaati da.t.thabba.m.
[22] sattamii sattamiiyeva, bhavate na tu a.t.thamii..
[22] pa~ncamiyaa tu saa esaa, ``cha.t.thii''ti na samiiritaa..
[21] cha.t.thiyaa ca bhavitabba.m, na saa ``cha.t.thii''ti iiritaa.
[21] majjhe cha.t.thi.m adassetvaa, eva.m tu kathanampi ca.

[03] ettha hi yathaa ``maataapitaro''ti vutte sili.t.thakathana.m hoti, tasmi.myeva vacane vipariyaya.m katvaa samaasavasena ``pitaamaataro''ti vutte sili.t.thakathana.m na hoti, tasmaa taadisii saddaracanaa apuujaniiyaa, ``pitaa maataa ca me dajju''nti paa.tho pana byaasavasena yathicchitappayogattaa puujaniiyo, evameva ``atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna''nti vutte sili.t.thakathana.m hoti, ``atiitapaccuppannaanaagata''nti evamaadinaa vutte sili.t.thakathana.m na hoti, tasmaa taadisii saddaracanaa apuujaniiyaa siyaa. ``atiitaaramma.naa paccu-ppannaanaagatagocaraa''ti vacana.m pana gaathaabandhasukhattha.m yathicchitappayogattaa puujaniiyameva. ayamettha paa.li veditabbaa --
[22] tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha''nti ca,
[21] ``ye cabbhatiitaa sambuddhaa, ye ca buddhaa anaagataa.
[22] athopi viharissanti, esaa buddhaana dhammataa''ti ca

[07] evamanekesu saddappayogesu. idha yathicchitappayogavasena atiitaanaagatapaccuppannakaalikaasu a.t.thasu vibhattiisu tisso paccuppannakaalikaa vibhattiyo aadimhi kathitaa, ta~nca kathana.m taasa~n~neva vohaarapathe yebhuyyena pavattito bahuppayogataa~naapanattha.m. taasu pana dvinna.m vibhattiina.m ``pa~ncamiisattamii''tisa~n~naa sili.t.thakathanicchaaya.m kamena vattabbaa, atiitaanaagatakaalikaa vibhattiyo apekkhitvaa kataa. icceva.m
[21] aadimhi kathana.m ta~nca, taasa.m paayena vuttito.
[21] yadi eva.m aya.m doso, aapajjati na sa.msayo.
[22] iti ce koci bhaaseyya, atthe akusalonaro..
